quests.title: Soul Survivor
quests.description: Discover the wonders of the new world you find yourself shipwrecked upon.

quests.title: Soul Survivor
quests.description: Discover the wonders of the new world you find yourself shipwrecked upon.

quests.title: Basic Needs
quests.description: Gather Flint and Wood, craft a Flint Skinning Knife at the campfire, and then talk to Urda.

quests.title: Basic Needs
quests.description: Gather Flint and Wood, craft a Flint Skinning Knife at the campfire, and then talk to Urda.

quests.title: Campfire Feast
quests.description: Hunt and skin a boar, make some light rations at Aelstrom and Urda's campfire, and then talk to Aelstrom.

quests.title: Campfire Feast
quests.description: Hunt and skin a boar, make some light rations at Aelstrom and Urda's campfire, and then talk to Aelstrom.

quests.title: Crewmates No More
quests.description: Defeat your Corrupted Crewmates and try to put them back to rest.

quests.title: Crewmates No More
quests.description: Defeat your Corrupted Crewmates and try to put them back to rest.

quests.title: Amidst the Wreckage
quests.description: Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Report back to Aelstrom and Urda's camp when you're done.

quests.title: Amidst the Wreckage
quests.description: Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Report back to Aelstrom and Urda's camp when you're done.

quests.title: Lessons of a Pirate's Life
quests.description: Search the shipwreck for a manifest and locate the valuable items on the list. Find and speak to Grace O'Malley when you're done.

quests.title: Lessons of a Pirate's Life
quests.description: Search the shipwreck for a manifest and locate the valuable items on the list. Find and speak to Grace O'Malley when you're done.

quests.title: Memories of Grace
quests.description: Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Return to the Watchtower when you're done.

quests.title: Memories of Grace
quests.description: Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Return to the Watchtower when you're done.

quests.title: Team Effort
quests.description: Talk to Grace O'Malley and then meet Aelstrom near the entrance to the sea caves.

quests.title: Team Effort
quests.description: Talk to Grace O'Malley and then meet Aelstrom near the entrance to the sea caves.

quests.title: Demon Storm
quests.description: Search the Sea Caves and destroy anything that might be the source of the Corruption Storm. Report back to Aelstrom at the Campsite when you're done.

quests.title: Demon Storm
quests.description: Search the Sea Caves and destroy anything that might be the source of the Corruption Storm. Report back to Aelstrom at the Campsite when you're done.

quests.title: Bearer of Bad Tidings
quests.description: Travel to the town of Corinth and warn the town about the Corrupted.

quests.title: Bearer of Bad Tidings
quests.description: Travel to the town of Prydwen and warn the town about the Corrupted.

quests.title: Feast to Famine
quests.description: Speak with the Elder Saatvik Agrawal to find out if you're welcome in Corinth.

quests.title: Rest Assured
quests.description: Visit the Inn and speak with Innkeep Verildis Jannsen to check in. Discover an old friend at the Inn.

quests.title: Money Talks
quests.description: Visit the Trading Post and one of the Storage Sheds in Corinth. Then speak with Grace at the Inn.

quests.title: Desperate Measures
quests.description: Visit Golden Fields to gather food to resupply Corinth.

quests.title: Firsthand Accounts
quests.description: Rescue and talk to farmers who survived what happened at Golden Fields.

quests.title: Tracking the Tribute
quests.description: Visit the Iron Rose Garrison and find out what happened to the Sorceress Medea's Tribute.

quests.title: Iron and Blood
quests.description: Rescue any surviving members of the Company of the Iron Rose and discover the fate of Sergeant Cotheran, then meet Leovix Silva at the Iron Keep.

quests.title: Commander's Correspondence
quests.description: Search Iron Keep to find any information about the missing tribute to Medea. Bring anything you find back to Leovix at the tavern in Corinth.

quests.title: The Missing Tribute
quests.description: Find out what really happened to the tribute to Medea by talking to the Speaker of the Winds and the Captain of the Guard.

quests.title: The Pirate Problem
quests.description: Travel to the camp site by Buccaneer Creek. Talk to Grace. Then look for Pirate Treasures at Buccaneer Creek.

quests.title: Web of Lies
quests.description: Find evidence that Marcel was here with the pirates. Recover the stolen Verdant Gemstone.

quests.title: Verdant Restoration
quests.description: Climb Mirador Shrine, complete the ancient puzzle, restore the gemstone, then speak with Nessa.

quests.title: Hidden Power
quests.description: Explore the Oracle Therismos to find the Ancient Map leading to the other Verdant Gemstones.

quests.title: The Speaker's Crimes
quests.description: Join Saatvik and Leovix in the Town Hall to confront the Speaker of the Winds with proof of his crimes.

quests.title: Verdant Connections
quests.description: Return the Verdant Gemstone to Eldergate by climbing to the top of the ruins.

quests.title: Jewel of the Sea
quests.description: Talk to Nessa near the Pirate Den known as Hecker's Haven. Then enter the Den and challenge Captain Korrapati to recover the third Verdant Gemstone.

quests.title: The Spirit Returns
quests.description: Return the third Verdant Gemstone to Sirius and solve the ancient puzzle.

quests.title: The Path of Thorns
quests.description: Infiltrate Thornhall, the most holy site of Windsward's druids, and find Medea. Convince her to give the region a second chance.

quests.title: Old Man by the River
quests.description: Travel north to Fisherman's Bend to find the Old Man that Medea believes can help expel the Corruption from your mind.

quests.title: The Invasion of Artemis
quests.description: Morgaine requests your assistance to battle the Ancient Huntress Artemis and the Angry Earth in Elysian Wilds. Collect seeds for an inoculate to enter and then work with the rangers and druids of the region to assess the enemy.

quests.title: Into the Wilds
quests.description: Morgaine requests that you travel west in search of survivors and Hargest's rangers. Help whoever you can, bring back any survivors, and if possible find a means to investigate the horrors beyond the inner bramble walls.

quests.title: Into the Darkness
quests.description: Morgaine once again needs our assistance breaking through into the lowland jungles for Captain Hargest, so that we can investigate the destroyed settlement of First Light. Help Hargest and her rangers make it down safely.

quests.title: Survivalist's Revenge
quests.description: Hargest thinks we should investigate Dayspring Mills on our way to the settlement, and evidence suggests that Albert Riches may be fighting back. Travel into the overgrown village and search for whatever clues you can find.

quests.title: First Light, Last Stand
quests.description: Albert Riches needs reinforcements! Travel northwest to Tanglesnap Hollows where Taurus disposed a chunk of the spirit shrine, destabilizing its effectiveness. It may be a longshot, but forage for ingredients to repair the shrine and correct its power to allow our allies safe passage.

quests.title: Abducted Artificer
quests.description: Survivalist Riches implores us for aid, saving his kidnapped friend Jihoon Kim. Kim was captured by Medusa in the initial invasion, but Riches recently spotted him being dragged east to Saircor, go rescue the Artificer if you can.

quests.title: Escaping The Ruins
quests.description: Jihoon Kim believes Medusa and Artemis stole an item of importance and stashed it at Portico Tideswallow. If the item is recovered, it may convince the Minotaur there is something sinister going on with Artemis and the Beast Lords.

quests.title: Maze and the Minotaur
quests.description: Kim asks that we boldly brave the Labyrinth of the minotaur Taurus, Northeast of the Ancient ruins, so that we may speak to him. Survive the deadly challenges within, and parley with the beastman if you can.

quests.title: Lord of the Pride
quests.description: To forge an alliance with the Beast Lords we will first need to prove ourselves to them. Taurus suggests that we begin with the Lion Lord Shirzad to the north in Shirzad's Pride. Complete his challenge and gain an audience.

quests.title: The Proving Grounds
quests.description: Shirzad has listened to our plea and is willing to entertain our propositions for now. Travel west to Kurok's Anchorage and speak with the Gorilla Lord Kurok. Deliver Shirzad's message and gain an audience with the Lord.

quests.title: Rage of the Mammoth
quests.description: Kurok has accepted our bid of peace for now, and is willing to reconvene with Shirzad over their fate on Aeternum. He now worries for his kin Mahantaram, the final Lord. Head east to the Trampled Lands, and face the mammoth.

quests.title: Garden of the Gorgon
quests.description: Morgaine entreats us to retrieve the Tear of Gaea at all costs, but first we must defeat Medusa. Taurus already makes his way to her vile gardens south west of the ranger camp. Slay the Gorgon and drive her from these lands.

quests.title: Arcana Aligned
quests.description: Trahern and Morgaine believe they may have devised a means of capturing Artemis and securing the Tear. Meet Morgaine up the road in the high mountains of what is now Scalefang Enclave to see what magic she has in mind.

quests.title: One With Nature
quests.description: Morgaine directs us upward to the bloom above. With our Azoth Staff now empowered by the arcane energies channeled from Elafry Pyrgo we have but one more component to secure. Fight with Trahern, claim it, and finish the spell.

quests.title: The End of New Eden
quests.description: Morgaine puts forth her final plea - capture Artemis and secure the Tear of Gaea from her grasp. With your allies at your back, ascend Elafry Pyrgo and battle the Ancient Artemis for the fate of the region, Aeternum, and the World.

quests.title: Welcome to Cutlass
quests.description: The ever magnanimous Patricia Reid wishes to welcome you to Spyglass Ridge and Cutlass Keys. Do her a favor, and speak to some of her friends, will ya?

quests.title: Pirate's Life For Me
quests.description: First Mate Grimm waits eagerly in the tavern to tell the tale of the cursed doubloons to any and all newcomers. Hear his words and listen well.

quests.title: It Crawls Beneath Us
quests.description: James Oxen is seeking a cure for the curse that turned his crew to stone. Speak to Glendyn Trahern in southeastern Cutlass Keys for answers.

quests.title: Flesh From Stone (Expedition)
quests.description: The Broodmother Medusa has turned Oxen's crew to stone and is spawning hordes of Hercyne to claim Aeternum. Gather ingredients for the antidote and defeat her.

quests.title: Welcome to Prydwen
quests.description: Check in at the Regent's Rise Inn, and keep an eye out for the pirate captain from the beach, Grace O'Malley.

quests.title: Friends with Coin
quests.description: Grace O'Malley has given you the coin she owes you. Look for bargains at the Trading Post and store the excess at the Storage Shed.

quests.title: The Knight-Regent
quests.description: Grace O'Malley says a messenger came from the Knight-Regent who's requested you come see her at the keep.

quests.title: Foreman's Fate
quests.description: Knight-Regent Jin Jae, knight in charge of Monarch's Bluffs, has asked you to help Allya Musa at Cynefin Mines.

quests.title: Crisis at the Mines
quests.description: A worried Allya Musa wants you to rescue any surviving miners at Cynefin Mine.

quests.title: A Most Mysterious Tablet
quests.description: Elias Derit believes a strange magical tablet is causing the trouble at the mines. Destroy the tablet and the Lost Pirates who guard it.

quests.title: Fragments of Truth
quests.description: Elias Derit wants you to take back news of Hiraeth Peak to Knight-Regent Jin Jae at Prydwen.

quests.title: Source of the Plague
quests.description: Knight-Regent Jin Jae asks you to bring the recovered tablet fragments to Sage Moira so she can study them for answers and to ask Minister Lochnir about the reports from the mine.

quests.title: Knight in the North
quests.description: Knight-Regent Jin Jae is beginning to trust you. She's asked you to join Ser Payne Bennett in challenging the Pirates encamped at Brysedd Shore.

quests.title: Brigands on the Beach
quests.description: Ser Payne has asked you to use unusual methods to fight the filthy Lost pirates. Cut off their supplies and set their boats adrift!

quests.title: A Pirate's Plan
quests.description: Grace O'Malley knows what's summoning the Lost. Go into the Pirates' den and destroy the evil altar.

quests.title: Report to Prydwen
quests.description: Ser Payne Bennett has asked you to use the Spirit Shrine to get to Prydwen quickly and warn the Regent about the Lost Pirates.

quests.title: Relics of the Ancients
quests.description: Regent Jin Jae has asked you to work with Sage Moira to determine if there is any connection between the tablet from the mine and the altar in the pirate's den.

quests.title: The Mystery of Minister Lochnir
quests.description: Moira now believes the Ancient tablet was taken from the ruins of Antares. She's asking you to search for any clues relating to the tablet, the Lost, or Minister Lochnir.

quests.title: The True Threat
quests.description: Grace O'Malley has asked you to share the truth about Lochnir with the Knight-Regent at Preiddeu Farms.

quests.title: Broken Oath
quests.description: The former knight Percilla Wallen suggests you investigate Teyrnon Keep to learn more about the return of the true heir, Ser Gawain.

quests.title: Kingdom of the Lost
quests.description: Percilla Wallen has advised you meet Grace and stay informed of her latest findings at Deadman's Shrine.

quests.title: The Plot against Prydwen
quests.description: Stop the Lost fleet from leaving Scallywag Bay. Start with their explosives and then destroy their altar.

quests.title: Corbenic Castle
quests.description: Percilla Wallen suspects Ser Gawain, the True Heir and Lochnir, the scheming minister, have gone to Corbenic Castle. Meet her there.

quests.title: Lost Legacy
quests.description: The time of judgement is nigh. Confront Ser Gawain, the True Heir and the pestilent Minister Lochnir at Corbenic Castle.

quests.title: A True Leader
quests.description: Ser Gawain and Lochnir have been vanquished. In the absence of the True Heir, find a True Ruler for the crown.

quests.title: Wilderness Wiseman
quests.description: Travel east to Fisherman's Bend to find the Old Man that Jin Jae believes can help expel the Corruption from your mind.

quests.title: Brimstone Under Siege
quests.description: A troubled woman at the Refugee Caravan has warned of an impending attack by the Corrupted Legion, and has asked for your help to defend the civilians.

quests.title: The Great Architect
quests.description: Ghazi Laghmani has asked for any possible assistance in finding her teacher, the Great Sage Imhotep, last seen near The Acropolis.

quests.title: Preemptive Strike
quests.description: Ghazi has received word that the Corrupted Legion is preparing an even larger assault on the Caravan. While she heads north to search for Imhotep, she has asked you to attack the Legion directly at their garrison of Crassus's Rise.

quests.title: Stirring in the Sands
quests.description: Imhotep continues to investigate a new threat, heading west toward Carthago. Once found, Ghazi anxiously awaits news of his return at Cavalier's Rest.

quests.title: A Blossoming Threat
quests.description: With the ambush by the Angry Earth, Ghazi is certain they are responsible for Imhotep's disappearance. She knows the Angry Earth have been seen around Jupiter's Grove, and asks again for your continued help in finding Imhotep.\n\nGhazi's scouts have reported that you will need a ranged weapon to complete this task.

quests.title: Past Prologue
quests.description: While Imhotep recuperates from his recent tribulations, Ghazi has suggested you read Imhotep's 'Legacy of the Ancients' and learn of the impact the Ancients had on Brimstone Sands.

quests.title: Watering the Seed
quests.description: Recovered from his kidnapping, the Great Sage Imhotep has told you of the strange seed carried north by the Angry Earth, likely to the Oasis Spontanea. He and Ghazi will await you at the Great Shrine of Thoth.

quests.title: Unraveling the Mystery
quests.description: Unable to breach the magic of the Ancient focus, Imhotep knows of a powerful spell which may provide answers. Relics from Aqua Anuket, Arit-en-Geb, and Anhur's Pride should empower his magic enough to succeed.

quests.title: Accursed Apophis
quests.description: Apophis's remarks have Imhotep worried about a grander machination involving Ancient technology. He suggests investigating an undisturbed Ancient vault in Hermopolis, where Apophis may have found materials for his plans, while he and Ghazi return to New Corsica.

quests.title: The Demon's Cauldron
quests.description: Imhotep's translation speaks of a method to merge two beings together, a practice thought long lost. The sulfurous jar indicates a visit to the Pools of Orcus to the west, and he asks your help in searching for clues to Apophis's plans.

quests.title: Power of the Ancients
quests.description: Imhotep is intimately familiar with the fragment of the Ancient power source, having designed the Pyramid of Akhet to house it. He suggests searching near Diospolis for an entry point to the pyramid's interior, the origin of the fragment.

quests.title: Scourge of Aeon Madness
quests.description: Adiana's revelation at the pyramid has caused Imhotep's Aeon Madness to assert itself, and Ghazi has asked for help in gathering local herbs needed to treat the Great Sage. She will attempt to calm Imhotep while you prepare the recipe.

quests.title: The Eye of Horus
quests.description: Ghazi's concern at Imhotep's flight is evident, and she begs your assistance in chasing him down. He ran toward the Gates of Sutekh, ranting about the Eye of Horus and the return of the gods.

quests.title: Challenging the Pharaoh
quests.description: The Eye of Horus has been taken, but droplets of quintessence form a path to follow. Imhotep, or perhaps something worse, must be at the end of the trail.

quests.title: A God Awakens
quests.description: With the Eye of Horus in hand, Imhotep has given you the location of the Necropolis of Sutekh, the resting place of an Ancient. Adiana and Apophis must not be allowed to rouse Sutekh from his slumber!

quests.title: The Wild Huntress
quests.description: With the immediate threat stymied and Imhotep stabilized, he has recalled long forgotten memories about a shrine to Artemis somewhere in the northern reaches of Everfall. Visiting it may provide a clue to Adiana's - Artemis's - next move.

quests.title: Secrets of the Heartgem
quests.description: <font color="#b2aea1">HEARTRUNE UNLOCK QUEST</font>\nThe Soulwardens sent Anna Rzsa to learn about an intriguing source of power in Brimstone Sands. Unlock your Heartgem's hidden potential at the Great Wall of Nebet-Het, then meet Scout Rzsa at the Palace of Nekhbet.

quests.title: Old Stone Remembers
quests.description: Desperate for a way to banish the cruel voice in your head, follow the rambling musings of the old hermit Yonas by seeking the wisdom of old stone carvings.

quests.title: Strength of a Soul
quests.description: To Learn more about the Soulwardens, face the Wardens' trials in the Tomb of the Old Warrior.

quests.title: Talk of the Town
quests.description: Yonas appears to have left you at the ruins, but luckily Grace O'Malley saw him pass by toward the town of Oxboro. Ask around to see if anyone has seen where he went off to.

quests.title: The Last Soulwarden
quests.description: Seek answers about the Soulwardens' fate within the tower Arcturus.

quests.title: Speaker of the Angry Earth
quests.description: Yonas Alazar says that if you want to become a Soulwarden, you'll need a living seed from the Angry Earth. Yonas recalls a woman in the wildnerness, elusive as a shadow, that may be able to help you acquire such a thing, if you can find her.

quests.title: The Daughterwell
quests.description: Explore the Canary Mine and purge any Corrupted manifestations might be blocking the flow of Azoth to Adiana's fountain in the Daughterwell.

quests.title: Weakness of the Ego
quests.description: Use Adiana's recipe to gather the ingredients to craft a tincture that will dampen the effects of Corruption.

quests.title: Plans of the Pestilent
quests.description: Adiana Theron suspects the Corrupted of Ebonrock Armory are looking for something. Thin their forces and determine their purpose there.

quests.title: A Living Conduit
quests.description: Adiana Theron has seen fit to grant you a seed of power, a fitting conduit for the weapon of a Soulwarden. Return to Yonas Alazar with news of your success.

quests.title: The Implement of a Soulwarden
quests.description: In search of the haft for your Azoth Staff, Yonas indicates the existence a hidden, secret cache within the hidden interior of Canis.

quests.title: Forgemaster's Legacy
quests.description: Search the Ancient ruin of Vulcanus for the materials to craft the Crosspiece of your Azoth Staff.

quests.title: An Order Reborn
quests.description: With the components of an ancient Soulwarden staff in hand, proceed to the forge beneath Shattered Obelisk. There, you will reignite the flame of the Soulwarden Order by bringing a new Azoth Staff into being.

quests.title: The Defense of Everfall
quests.description: Deliver news of hope to the people of Everfall. The staff in your hands carries with it the power to destroy Corruption at its roots.

quests.title: The Invasion of Everfall
quests.description: Though the townsfolk of Everfall refuse to help themselves, you have the means to protect them. Guard Captain Franc Dubois offers moral support for your quest to battle the Corrupted in Northern Everfall. He simply asks you to keep an eye out for Herbalist Howe during your travels.

quests.title: Destiny Unearthed
quests.description: Acquire a Heartgem, meant to shield your soul against the effects of Corruption. Search southern Everfall for rare reagents needed to create a new Heartgem.

quests.title: The Ritual
quests.description: Complete the ritual deep in Amrine Temple to conquer death and become a Soulwarden in full.

quests.title: Darkness in the Brightwood
quests.description: Yonas recalls a priest named Brother Umberto who once ministered to the Soulwardens. The two of you decide to seek out Umberto in the town of Walsham in Brightwood and learn his fate.

quests.title: The Shining Knight
quests.description: On the trail of Brother Umberto, you and Yonas have decided to head west, where the priest apparently went to request assistance from the knight, Ser Galahad.

quests.title: Losing the Faith
quests.description: Investigate Staudt's Manor and Kalterstein Cemetery for more clues about Umberto and then meet Galahad and Yonas at the shrine to the north.

quests.title: Crimson Menace
quests.description: Yonas has discovered that the Corrupted have claimed several resource locations in Brightwood, including a massive iron mine. You need to investigate if they have an ulterior motive in seizing the mine and then meet Yonas in the town of Calvary.

quests.title: The Gates of Great Cleave
quests.description: Yonas is scouting out the Corrupted presence in Great Cleave where he has asked that you join him and formulate a strategy for driving the enemy out of Brightwood.

quests.title: The Vigils Truth
quests.description: Galahad has reached an impasse in the investigation into what happened to Umberto and the Bright Vigil. It's decided that you will speak with Mayor Pennyfather and follow up on any hints he's willing to share.

quests.title: Betrayal at Brightrest
quests.description: Mayor Tunstall Pennyfather admitted that he was aware of the Bright Vigil's atrocities and the curse that followed. After discussing with Galahad and the Master Alchemist Sun Fuchun, it becomes clear where the trail leads next.

quests.title: The Azoth Tree
quests.description: In order to cleanse the curse from Caer Dun, Sun Fuchun needs Sacred Waters collected from the Azoth Tree in the nearby grove, but it's necessary to acquire vessels from the Shamans in the neighboring caverns in order to extract the waters. After collecting the waters, rejoin Sun Fuchun.

quests.title: Umbertos Sentence
quests.description: Galahad has tracked Umberto to Vigil's Stand and it's now time to confront the fallen priest, acquire his Heartgem and then rejoin Galahad at the Postrekhin Shrine.

quests.title: The Curse of Caer Dun
quests.description: Working with Ser Galahad, you've defeated Grand Vigilant Umberto and taken his Heartgem. All that remains is to return to Caer Dun and follow Sun Fuchun's instructions for removing the curse.

quests.title: The Corpse Crone
quests.description: Following the vision you received from the Azoth Tree, you've decided to search for the sorceress with the purple eye. You must revisit Mayor Tunstall Pennyfather in Calvary and then meet Galahad on the road to Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: The Crone's Curse
quests.description: Find any information pertaining to the whereabouts of the Corpse Crone.

quests.title: The Curse of Karburg
quests.description: Discover what the Corpse Crone did to Karburg.

quests.title: Bridge Into the Past
quests.description: Follow the Corpse Crone's studies on the Vega Bridge.

quests.title: A Weaver's Yarn
quests.description: Ask the citizens of Twillen about the Corpse Crone to pick up her trail.

quests.title: Follow the Marsh Lights
quests.description: Follow the Marsh Lights to find the Corpse Crone's location.

quests.title: Temple of the Crone
quests.description: Destroy the Arcane Anchors Morgaine uses to power the barrier at her cave.

quests.title: A Face in the Mist
quests.description: Travel through the barrier at Morgaine's cave, tell her about your vision, and learn about Morgaine's past.

quests.title: Old Wounds
quests.description: Convince Galahad that Morgaine's help is necessary before meeting Morgaine at Canopus.

quests.title: The Power of Azoth
quests.description: Collect Ancient Shield Devices for Morgaine and meet her at the Ancient Device in Andrometus.

quests.title: Unexpected Prisoner
quests.description: Explore Andrometus to discover what has been imprisoned there.

quests.title: The Source of the Blight
quests.description: Follow the trail of Blight back to its Source for Morgaine.

quests.title: Corruption Spreads its Hooks
quests.description: Travel back to Caer Dun to bring Yonas news from Morgaine.

quests.title: Through the Gates of Great Cleave
quests.description: Recover supplies being shipped through the blockade and rescue the Wardens who accompanied the delivery.

quests.title: Secrets in the Ruins
quests.description: Visit the Ancient Ruins to find out what the Corrupted have been after.

quests.title: Assessing the Enemy
quests.description: Join Yonas at one of the forts, get past its defenses, and discover how the Corrupted plan on contacting the source of Corruption.

quests.title: Sabotage the Supply Chain
quests.description: Assault the mines to cripple Thorpe's mining operation.

quests.title: All Part of the Plan
quests.description: Fight your way across the bridge, meet with Yash, and disable the forts on your way to the western outpost.

quests.title: Mounting An Attack
quests.description: Follow the route of the ore through the mountain road and destroy any Unfinished Portals.

quests.title: Beyond the Gates
quests.description: Rescue the captured Soulwardens, push on to the top of the mountain, confront Thorpe, and close the portal to Corruption.

quests.title: To Stand Against The Dark
quests.description: Talk to Yonas about the plan of battle, then track down and fight Commander Thorpe.

quests.title: Wounds Run Deep
quests.description: Return to the outpost and find supplies to heal Yonas. Meet up with Grace and get word from Caer Dun.

quests.title: A Better Defense
quests.description: Shore up the defenses of Caer Dun to protect against future attacks.

quests.title: The Untamed Garden
quests.description: After a successful offensive in Great Cleave, the focus now turns to a more permanent solution for Corruption.\nTravel into Edengrove with Sun and Morgaine to search for knowledge, weapons, or allies that may help in the battle ahead.

quests.title: On the Wizard's Trail
quests.description: Having reached the safety of the traveler's camp, Sun resolves to learn what she can before traveling to the settlement.\nAccompany Morgaine to the north in search of evidence of Myrddin's fate.

quests.title: The Hope of New Growth
quests.description: While Morgaine remains in the Crystal Cave, Sun takes the opportunity to further explore the mysteries of the Angry Earth.\nAccompany Sun on her exploration of the crater.

quests.title: Dowsing for Answers
quests.description: Communing with the mind of the Angry Earth revealed a new facet of the strange creatures.\nHelp Sun locate the sacred Angry Earth location called the Motherwell.

quests.title: The Wizard's Trial
quests.description: Morgaine believes that Myrddin has hidden vital secrets away somewhere within Edengrove - and has a hunch that the towers around the crater may hold the key to finding them.\nTravel with her to the towers and investigate her theory.

quests.title: Myrddin's Fate
quests.description: Unlocking the strange devices in the towers of Edengrove revealed a tower floating above the crater, which Morgaine believes to be Myrddin's prison.\nInvestigate this strange area with Morgaine and Galahad.

quests.title: The Staff of Wizardry
quests.description: At Myrddin's urging, the hunt begins for the headpiece of his Staff of Wizardry, a relic that could shift the balance of power in the fight against Corruption.\nTravel to the southern mines of Edengrove and locate the headpiece of the Staff.

quests.title: Speaker for the Green
quests.description: With the headpiece of the Staff of Wizardry rescued from Isabella's forces, a way must be found to remove the taint of Corruption from the relic.\nFind the Speaker of the Green and gain permission to enter the Motherwell.

quests.title: The Motherwell
quests.description: Against Adiana's warning, the decision has been made to purify the Staff of Wizardry in the Motherwell even knowing the consequences.\nEnter the Motherwell and purify the Headpiece of the Staff.

quests.title: A Shadow Falls
quests.description: Morgaine's dream and Isabella's whispering tells of an attack on the Soulwarden fortress of Caer Dun.\nHurry to Caer Dun and investigate.

quests.title: From the Ashes of Caer Dun
quests.description: After the sacking of Caer Dun, the Soulwardens risk losing everything if the Tempest strikes again. In order to survive, they must relocate to the presumed safety of Ebonscale Reach.

quests.title: Discord and Balance
quests.description: With the reveal that the Tempest can see through your eyes, the Soulwardens remain on the verge of destruction. On counsel from Sun Fuchun, a plan is devised to seek out her old master who might be able to help if he has not fallen to Corruption.

quests.title: Together, Without a Home
quests.description: Now that the Tempest is blinded to your whereabouts and actions, the survival of the Soulwardens is starting to become possible. Rejoin them at the temporary refuge scouted out by Grace O'Malley and bring them necessary supplies.

quests.title: A New Beginning
quests.description: Survival is not enough. The gloom permeating the Soulwarden Refuge is palpable. Find a way with Grace O'Malley to raise morale and remind everyone of the need to keep hope alive.

quests.title: The Empress of Ebonscale
quests.description: With hope among the Soulwardens rekindled, there remains a need for a powerful ally if they are to overcome the Tempest. Sun Fuchun has won you an audience with the Empress of Ebonscale Reach; meet with her and forge an alliance.

quests.title: Art of War and Friendship
quests.description: In order to win the favor of Empress Zhou, it is necessary to perform a ritual on the mountaintop now controlled by the Corrupted. Ascend the peak of Heavenly Rise while lighting incense, and ring the Celestial Bell to reassure the people of Ebonscale Reach that the Empress is still fighting for them.

quests.title: Lament of the Empress
quests.description: Assured of your good intentions and strength, Empress Zhou reveals the tragic story of her family. Work with Sun Fuchun to find a way to heal the pains of the past, and convince the Empress that the Soulwardens are worthy of an alliance with Ebonscale Reach.

quests.title: The Tormented Prince
quests.description: With your help, Sun Fuchun has all the ingredients needed to rescue Zhou Liang from his monstrous condition. Meet her at the Wood Shrine and utilize the Soulsever Incense to save him from his prison.

quests.title: Return of the Child
quests.description: Prince Liang has been saved from his affliction, fulfilling the Soulwarden's commitment to the alliance with Ebonscale Reach. Meet with Empress Zhou atop Serenity Monastery and present her son, healed and finally returned to her.

quests.title: Fallen Dynasty
quests.description: With Empress Zhou fallen to Corruption and determined to sail away from Aeternum, Prince Liang is in danger and so is the rest of the world. On Grace O'Malley's advice, gain access to the Royal Pier and the Empress's ship.

quests.title: A Mother's Dream
quests.description: With access to the Royal Pier attained, Empress Zhou can now be reached and stopped from escaping Aeternum. Confront and defeat her before Ebonscale Reach falls further into Corruption.

quests.title: The New Rising Sun
quests.description: Corrupted Empress Zhou is defeated and her tragic ambitions thwarted. In the aftermath of destruction, the Soulwarden have lost a powerful ally. But Prince Liang is safe, and Ebonscale Reach is secure from further Corruption. Debrief with your allies and plan next steps in the fight against the Tempest.

quests.title: The Shattered Mountain
quests.description: Yash Zafar's investigations into Shattered Mountain have uncovered signs that the Corrupted took an unusual interest in finding and imprisoning a specific individual. Search for this mysterious person and determine if they could be an ally in your fight against the Tempest.

quests.title: Through a Mirror Darkly
quests.description: Father Russo is convinced from your account that a spark of goodness still exists within the Tempest. Gather relics saturated with her past emotions from the time before she fell to Corruption.

quests.title: Wisdom and Madness and Folly
quests.description: With the collection of the relics, Father Russo wishes to psychically attack the Tempest with her own memories and feelings. Join him atop the nearby vista in view of the Tempest's stronghold, and strike back at her with all of your power.

quests.title: Marched Across the Land
quests.description: Now that Isabella has been wounded and frightened, it is time to secure enough allies that can overcome the defenses of Myrkgard. Yash Zafar has heard rumors that Morgaine is in trouble; search Edengrove and bring her back to the safety of the Soulwarden encampment.

quests.title: The Harvest is Come
quests.description: Morgaine has returned to her senses after being helped by the Angry Earth Peacemaker. Phaeris provides a surprising opportunity for the Soulwardens to secure Blighted forces in the upcoming battle against the Tempest. Create a connection between Phaeris and the Blighted Angry Earth so they can communicate.

quests.title: Angel That Brings Death
quests.description: Morgaine is concerned that even with Blighted Angry Earth on their side, the Soulwardens remain at a strategic disadvantage. After being reminded of her ability in Weaver's Fen to command the Lost, she will attempt to exert her will over the Ancient Guardians in the nearby cavern to further bolster your forces.

quests.title: As Black as Sackcloth
quests.description: At the behest of Emperor-in-Waiting Zhou Liang, Sun Fuchun has come to Shattered Mountain to offer support. She requires a special ingredient to concoct war-grade smoke bombs that will both distract the Corrupted and prevent reinforcements from flanking the Soulwardens during the imminent assault on Myrkgard.

quests.title: To Prepare a Place For You
quests.description: After much research, Father Russo has discovered what he believes is the means to achieve the Tempest's defeat and salvation. Search the depths of Illurmin Canyon for two Ancient Artifacts that he requires to craft a powerful spiritual weapon.

quests.title: A Time For Peace, A Time for War
quests.description: On the eve of battle, the mood in the Soulwarden War Camp is grim. While Father Russo works to fashion his ultimate weapon, walk the camp and bolster the morale of your many allies.

quests.title: Walls Came Tumbling Down
quests.description: The time has come to strike at the heart of Corruption. As the vanguard of the Soulwardens and their newfound allies, assault Myrkgard and overthrow the Tempest's dominion.

quests.title: Prodigal Daughter
quests.description: The Tempest has been backed into a corner and has nowhere to retreat now except for within herself. Before she is able to open more Corruption Portals throughout Aeternum, use Father Russo's weapon to enter her mind and face her in combat for the last time.

quests.title: The First Things Have Passed Away
quests.description: Corruption has been weakened and its loudest voice has been silenced: the Tempest is gone. Find Father Russo to understand what will become of Aeternum in the passing of this storm, and celebrate the victory with your allies.

quests.title: A Shifting in the Sands
quests.description: Now that Isabella has finally been defeated and the threat of her forces contained in Shattered Mountain, the Soulwardens turn their attention to whispers of new dangers arising in the deserts to the west.

quests.title: Truffle Fever
quests.description: Collect any Truffles you can find in the forest and bring them to Hapless Howe in the settlement. Look for any Herbs or Berries you can gather as well.

quests.title: Truffle Fever
quests.description: Collect any Truffles you can find in the forest and bring them to Hapless Howe in the settlement. Look for any Herbs or Berries you can gather as well.

quests.title: Reaper's Locus (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat the Starstone Reaper and Collect the Reaper's Locus. Talk to Herbalist Lau in the Brightwood Settlement when the task is done.

quests.title: Secrets of the Earth
quests.description: Collect spores from Bronzeroot Warriors in Pendle Hollow and bone dust from the Lost at Pendleton. Return to Embalmer Bankole when the task is complete.

quests.title: Earth Will Provide
quests.description: Defeat the Bronzewood Dryads who are guarding stores of precious alkahest. Meet back up with Embalmer Bankole east of Bronzegrove.

quests.title: Infernal Armaments
quests.description: Disrupt the Corrupted war effort by defeating their leaders at Corlew's Mine and Shervey's Lumbermill. Then meet with Ranger Shui Tijong outside of Calvary.

quests.title: Belly of the Corrupted
quests.description: Sabotage the food supply chain for the Corrupted at Reida's Burrow. Talk to Ranger Shui Tijong near Calvary when the task is done.

quests.title: Location Scout
quests.description: Search for vibrant waterfalls for Wolcott to paint and place an easel at each one. Talk to Painter Wolcott in Brightwood when the task is done.

quests.title: Eye for Reflection
quests.description: Search for dynamic waterfalls for Wolcott to paint and place an easel at each one. Talk to Painter Wolcott in Brightwood when the task is done.

quests.title: Wolcott's Masterpiece
quests.description: Search for picturesque lakes for Wolcott to paint and place an easel at each one. Talk to Painter Wolcott in Brightwood when the task is done.

quests.title: A Simple Tea
quests.description: Collect Undefiled Tea Leaves from Verdant Cavern and Lush Sugarsap from the Lush Hideaway. Bring them back to Naturalist Khunbish in Brightwood.

quests.title: Azoth Tree Achene
quests.description: Defeat the Angry Earth Leader Ceran at the Azoth Tree and collect his Achene. Talk to Naturalist Khunbish in Brightwood when the task is done.

quests.title: Grizzly Neighbors
quests.description: Help Hunter Hutchison in Brightwood get vengeance against some savage bears in Greyvale that destroyed his family.

quests.title: Papa Bear (Elite)
quests.description: Hunter Hutchison has asked you to destroy Gren, the massive bear who killed his wife, and reclaim his wife's ring. Bring the ring back to Hunter Hutchinson in Brightwood.

quests.title: Memories of Another Life
quests.description: Megara Pantazis lived in the Walsham area many decades ago. She's asked you to retrieve her mementos from the town and return them to her in Brightwood so she can relive her past.

quests.title: Til Death do us Part
quests.description: Megara Pantazis has admitted the love of her life was actually Pastor Prewitt. She's asked you be sure nothing of his human nature remains. Talk to her in Brightwood when the task is complete.

quests.title: Earthly Treasures
quests.description: Aethelwynn, a self-proclaimed treasure hunter, needs help finding lucrative graves in Brightwood. Find records of Brightwood's residents, then return to Aethelwynn near Deggendorf.

quests.title: Lost and Returned
quests.description: Aethelwynn has identified two promising graves that might contain treasure. Scatter the lost defending the coffins, and investigate each grave. Then, return to Aethelwynn with your spoils.

quests.title: Music to Her Ears
quests.description: Though nervous about its fearful reputation, Aethelwynn still wants to see if there's treasure in the old Cathedral and its neighboring village. Investigate each location, then return to Aethelwynn.

quests.title: Dark Legacy
quests.description: Though Aethelwynn said she would meet you later, she is nowhere to be seen. Mortemer's Manor and Brightrest Cemetery seem to be the most likely locations to find her.

quests.title: Reunion
quests.description: Aethelwynn is finally ready to face her past and tell you what she's been seeking. Help her track down her brother-in-law by searching nearby villages, then return to her at the spirit shrine.

quests.title: Heart of Darkness (Elite)
quests.description: Aethelwynn suspects that her sister's necklace is in the greedy hands of Archminister Havelock. Destroy him, find the necklace, and return to Aethelwynn at the spirit shrine.

quests.title: As Good As My Word
quests.description: Find Ranger Heo Do-yun's previous associates. Once found, let them know Heo Do-yun is still alive.

quests.title: Mapping The Edge Of Despair
quests.description: Find the best locations to map out enemy camps in northern Great Cleave. Then bring your notes back to Ranger Heo Do-yun.

quests.title: Picking Up The Pieces
quests.description: Recover weapons and armor from Ranger Heo Do-yun's fallen companions. Recover Mardea's Shield, Hanu's Spear, Topalian's Helm, and Kaipo's Axe.

quests.title: The Balemaw Beast
quests.description: Find the notorious Balemaw Beast which has been preying on travelers in the region.

quests.title: Wolves Of Winter
quests.description: Track the beasts that have been attacking travelers to their lair and defeat them.

quests.title: The Beast Returns
quests.description: The Balemaw Beast struck again! Track the beast up Mangled Heights and defeat it!

quests.title: A Spot Of Luxury
quests.description: Gather beautiful Spotted Pelts from Bobcats to add to Rue Horne's collection.

quests.title: Fabulous Furs
quests.description: Gather fantastically colored pelts from local cougars and elk to add to Rue Horne's collection.

quests.title: Pure Delight
quests.description: Gather brilliant Pure White Pelts from wolves to add to Rue Horne's collection.

quests.title: White As Bone
quests.description: Collect Ancient Ivory for Valta so she can add it to a poppet.

quests.title: Red As Blood
quests.description: Collect blood red Firebright Rubies from the mine for Valta so she can add them to a poppet.

quests.title: Black As Ebony
quests.description: Collect night black pieces of Charred Ebony for Valta so she can add them to a poppet.

quests.title: An Offering For Offspring
quests.description: Travel to the Wishing Tree and leave the Poppet as an offering so that Valta may one day have a child of her own.

quests.title: Perfect Piroshkis
quests.description: Gather Dried Dill, Crumbly Aged Cheese, and Tenderized Meat for Aksinya.

quests.title: To Warm The Soul Warden
quests.description: Bring Piping-Hot Piroshkis to Soulwarden Pedro Carrillo at Warden's Rise before they get cold!

quests.title: Ice Chronicles
quests.description: Find Kazu, the owner of the journal. Maybe he can teach you more about the glyphs in Aeternum.

quests.title: Glyph Of The Wolf
quests.description: Kazu turned blind when he tried to activate the strange new glyph. Help him research a similar one at Mokosh Springs.

quests.title: The Curse That Goes Round
quests.description: Break the curse that has Simone going around in circles.

quests.title: A Passing Good Knight
quests.description: Assist an aged and possibly delusional knight with his plan to impress the Soulwardens.

quests.title: Armed At All Points
quests.description: Defeat the Siege Engineers at Riven Anvil.

quests.title: Battle Wounds Bestow Honor
quests.description: Alas and alack! As Sir Hotspur lays stricken, accept the mantle and report to the Soulwardens.

quests.title: Orbs of Power
quests.description: Gypsum Kilns are used to create powerful items. Find Gypsum then learn the ways of the kiln.

quests.title: No Good Deed
quests.description: Recover the supplies described in Huntsman Lee's requisition note and discover the fate of his porter, Riker.

quests.title: Fine Furs For Fine Folk
quests.description: Acquire Midnight Hides from Midnight Den to replicate Huntsman Lee's fancy jacket for inquiring noble families.

quests.title: A Circle of Stars
quests.description: Investigate towers Orion and Draco to acquire Ancient Devices, then return them with the notes to William Heron in the Everfall Settlement.

quests.title: Stellar Research
quests.description: Investigate towers Perseus and Lupus, then return to William Heron to tell him what you found.

quests.title: Beacons in the Dark
quests.description: Investigate towers Norma, Leo, and Hercules and see if there is a way to activate them.

quests.title: Azoth Awakening
quests.description: Collect Azoth Dust from Ancient Guardians at towers Canus, Ursa, and Monoceros.

quests.title: Constellation Convergence
quests.description: Retrieve the Armillary Sphere from the Shattered Obelisk, along with Ancient Runekeys held by its defenders. Return them to William Heron, who hopes to unlock the Armillary Sphere.

quests.title: Foreman's Ledger (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the Foreman's Ledger in Amrine Excavation. Report back to William Heron in the Everfall Settlement when your task is complete.

quests.title: Starstone of Shattering (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the Starstone Diadem from Greundgul the Regent inside the Shattered Obelisk. Report back to William Heron in the Everfall Settlement when your task is complete.

quests.title: Dishonorable Daughter
quests.description: Venture into Arcturus to recover an item of equal value to the one Tamra Ayad destroyed in her home estate, and return the item to Tamra Ayad.

quests.title: Curious Child
quests.description: Bring the Ancient Scrolls to Tamra Ayad to assess their value.

quests.title: An Heir Transformed
quests.description: Venture into the Varangian camp to recover the stolen Ancient relics for Tamra Ayad.

quests.title: Canary in the Corrupted Mine
quests.description: Scout the land of Canary Mine to investigate the Corrupted threat.

quests.title: Salting the Earth
quests.description: Poison the earth of Ebonrock Cavern and Ebonrock Quarry while taking down as many Corrupted as you can for Tekla Petrowski.

quests.title: Tekla's Tragedy
quests.description: Venture to the Everfall Settlement to discuss the Corrupted incursion with Huntsman Odnell Lee.

quests.title: Avenging Audrey
quests.description: Shame the Corrupted forces occupying Kelleher's Farmstead by taking out the Lieutenants and speak to Tekla Petrowski.

quests.title: Bittersweet Memory
quests.description: Return the Lost Locket to Tekla Petrowski.

quests.title: The Lovers' Flowers
quests.description: Touched by your return of the locket, Tekla Petrowski wishes for you to gather a bouquet of Meadowlake Flowers at Meadowlake Fishery to remember Audrey.

quests.title: Lee's Condolences
quests.description: Relay what has happened with Tekla Petrowski to Odnell Lee in the Everfall Settlement.

quests.title: The Magnum Opus
quests.description: Longing to rise above his station as a butler, Atticus Delphi wishes to share his musical talents with the world. With so many instruments to choose from, he is struck with a moment of indecision.

quests.title: Reputation is Everything
quests.description: What good is a composition if it goes unheard? Play the Magnum Opus throughout the town in a grand debut as a composer!

quests.title: It's Who You Know
quests.description: With his reputation growing with each passing day, now is the time to seek a patron. One does not simply approach the patriarch of a great house on a whim, however

quests.title: Everyone has a Price
quests.description: The great family Sacco will not be humiliated so easily. With Atticus bound to his contractual duties, his patron may be the only one who can set him free to practice his craft.

quests.title: Ever Been Mauled?
quests.description: Felix Livius challenges you to "wrestle" a bear for the raw thrill of it all.

quests.title: Bragging Rights
quests.description: Talk to Huntsman Lee in the Everfall Settlement about your bear experience.

quests.title: Hope in a Bottle
quests.description: The Lost Pirates of the Riverworn Grotto have stolen Jacob Evans' last shipment of mead, driving him to the brink of despair.

quests.title: No Time for Wine
quests.description: With his mead returned, Jacob Evans turns his attention to his next source of woe: a shipment of missing wine.

quests.title: Master and Commandaria
quests.description: Jacob Evans has remembered the name of one of his tormentors. Help him get some revenge on Admiral Arias.

quests.title: Raising the Bar
quests.description: Jacob is entrusting you with delivering the priceless bottle of Commandaria to Polly's bar, in the hopes that it will save her business.

quests.title: Cure For What Ails You
quests.description: The wares that Anwir is hawking seem a little suspect. Nevertheless, he's happy to pay for help "improving" them.

quests.title: The Secret Ingredient
quests.description: Anwir Hughes is back, with another scheme to "improve" his Ancient Miracle Elixir.

quests.title: Potions for the People
quests.description: Nothing can go wrong with distributing Anwir's Ancient Miracle Elixir to the people of Everfall, right?

quests.title: Bottle It Up
quests.description: Try to piece together the strange alchemical recipe, then bring it to a Syndicate alchemist for further study.

quests.title: Miner's Keepers
quests.description: One ill-fated miner's find is another better-fated miner's treasure.

quests.title: The Yearly Convergence
quests.description: Welcome to the Winter Convergence! Check out the Holiday Huts in the Winter Villages to see what items can be crafted there.

quests.title: Lost Presents
quests.description: Find one of the many Lost Presents around Aeternum and return it to the Winter Wanderer in the Winter Village.

quests.title: The Power of Gleamite
quests.description: Mine a fallen Gleamite Crystal and return it to the Winter Wanderer in the Winter Village.

quests.title: Forever Winter
quests.description: Locate the Winter Warrior's spread of the Forever Winter and collect his Hailspikes as proof of victory against the chiling threat.

quests.title: Enter The Arena
quests.description: Maximus Marcellus invites you to participate in a team versus team extravaganza. \nUse the Activities Menu to queue for a match

quests.title: Tenacious Rose
quests.description: Mysterious Raiders have taken over the ruins of Stonereach Keep where Abigail Rose was living. She's asked you to help figure who they are, why they're here and how she can get rid of them.

quests.title: The Lost Scarecrow
quests.description: Locate Abigail Rose's missing companion, and find any evidence that points to what the Varangian Knights are searching for.

quests.title: Relic Reclamation
quests.description: Find the notebook carried south by the Varangian Knights by speaking with the apprentice Caoimhe

quests.title: Secrets of the Swamp
quests.description: Collect Ancient Stone Tablets and Rubbings from any Ancient Plaques within Sunken Aspect, and return them to Legatus Fulvius in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Hope Springs Eternal
quests.description: Investigate the Ancient ruins of Skyview Repose, and return to Legatus Fulvius in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Paths Unseen
quests.description: Colllect any remnants of the Ancients you can find in Rackham's Hollow. Then report to Legatus Fulvius in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Anatomy of the Heart
quests.description: Search for any remaining Ancient artifacts within the ruins of Sha Makogai. Then report to Legatus Fulvius in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Seek and Hide
quests.description: Uncover the whereabouts of Antiquarian Abbingdon, last sent to Syleio Seko.

quests.title: Secrets Best Left Unshared
quests.description: Distract the Starvault Guardians while Antiquarian Abbingdon frees the Ancient artifact.

quests.title: An Expanding Threat
quests.description: Investigate the Lost Pirates at Maria's Rest. Then report to Headmen Onizuka in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Defiance and Doubt
quests.description: Track down the Pirate deserter, possibly hiding out in Shipflight Comb in Reekwater.

quests.title: A Hunger for Freedom
quests.description: Find, craft, or purchase Meager Meals and Fresh Water for Katring Sanders in Reekwater.

quests.title: Queen's Gambit
quests.description: Destroy the mysterious Cursed Banners throughout Reekwater, then return to Katring Sanders.

quests.title: Shivering Timbers
quests.description: Put a stop to the salvage operations at Scavenger's Shore and Bleachwood Coast, and report back to Headman Onizuka in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Words of Power
quests.description: Search Syleio Seko for clues about the Siren Queen's plans. Then report to Headman Onizuka in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: A Plan's Deconstruction
quests.description: Destroy the twisted Ancient relics in Mistywater Thorp. Then report to Headman Onizuka in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: The Queen is Dead (Elite)
quests.description: Hunt down the Siren Queen's lieutenants, destroy the Ancient Machine, and defeat the Siren Queen. Then report to Headman Onizuka in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Long Live the Queen (Elite)
quests.description: Hunt down the Siren Queen's lieutenants, acquire a key, and defeat the Siren Queen.

quests.title: On Floral Fauna
quests.description: Retrieve the Dryad journals dropped by Herbalist Langlais in the Glimmerfen. Then return it to her in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Pruning and Irrigation
quests.description: Provide Marsh Walker Afolabi with her requested fresh Dryad Cuttings from the Glimmerfen, and Azoth Water from Azoth Springs.

quests.title: New Growth
quests.description: Search the Virid Grotto for Azoth crystals, and bring pieces of them back for Marsh Walker Afolabi in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Excising the Blighted Root
quests.description: Hunt down The Blight Bringer and any Blight Nodules in Lambent Muskeg, then travel to Fisher's Glory to ensure the Blight has not spread. Then report to Herbalist Langlais in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Burden of Atonement
quests.description: Take the Dryad Offering to the Mysterious Altar in Fisher's Glory as an apology. Then report to Herbalist Langlais in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Upstream Investigation
quests.description: Search Sha Makogai and the fallen lighthouse, Hingatirn, for any clues on the Dryads' presence in Reekwater. Then report to Herbalist Langlais in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: The Eternal Pool (Elite)
quests.description: Investigate the Eternal Pool and face whatever challenges lie within. Then report to Herbalist Langlais in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: The Dryad Promenade (Elite)
quests.description: Follow the Dryad Promenade path into the depths of the Eternal Pool, and lay the Protector of the Source to rest.

quests.title: The Original Guardian (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the Guardian's Eye from Chardis in the Lazarus Well Expedition. Then report to Legatus Fulvius in the Reekwater Settlement.

quests.title: Death's Demise
quests.description: The druid Eoin Dornoll seeks help in retrieving 3 ancient hearts of enemies within Lazarus Instrumentality  so that he can study how the Ancients corrupted the natrual order and created immortality.

quests.title: Brushed by Fate
quests.description: Return Fude Hinode's set of brushes to her from where she left them at Eldergate.

quests.title: Seeds of Steel
quests.description: Find and read the creed of the Iron Rose.

quests.title: A Garden of Iron
quests.description: Obtain an Iron Rose Sword for Roya.

quests.title: By Any Other Name
quests.description: Deliver Roya's application to the missing mercenary.

quests.title: Supply Run
quests.description: Craft tools, then gather and refine the materials requested by Talesa Serrano.

quests.title: Fire Up the Forge
quests.description: Craft an Iron Longsword at the Forge and bring it to Mason Zhang Haoyu in Corinth when you have completed your task.

quests.title: A Town in Need
quests.description: Check the Corinth Town Board to discover more ways to help Corinth prosper

quests.title: Just Dessert
quests.description: Travel to Sweet Acre Farm to recover Kathrijn's Blueberry Compote and harvest Strawberries, Blueberries, Squash or Corn.

quests.title: Pirates of Spice
quests.description: Travel to the area around Buccaneer Creek and Mother's Tears to locate the missing spices.

quests.title: The Bear of Scratchrock
quests.description: Hunt Pumas in the area and bring down the bear of Scratchrock Burrow. Report back to Tsui Fen when the task is complete.

quests.title: Shot Across the Bow
quests.description: Sabotage cannons and light striped powderkegs on fire at the pirate stronghold. Defeat Shamgar then return to Michael Lewis.

quests.title: Warp and Weft
quests.description: Collect Loom Patterns and Fabric Samples from Sirius and Stoneview Seabreak.

quests.title: Zoology 101
quests.description: Margot is researching strange things in Aeternum. She wants to know why there are Buffalo here. Investigate the area and gather samples and any notes you find regarding them.

quests.title: A Wyrd and Wonderful World
quests.description: Margot has discovered a plant that seems to have strange properties. Gather sprigs of it and present them to people around Windsward to see what their reactions are.

quests.title: This Mortal Sphere
quests.description: A group of archeologists have gone missing near an ancient tomb. Follow their trail and discover what has happened then report back to Elric Chapman.

quests.title: Creation Myths
quests.description: Elric has some interesting theories about the spheres. Follow his instructions and set them in place. Then report your findings back to him.

quests.title: Towering Tools
quests.description: Collect any remaining tools of the Ancients from Fallswatch Overlook and Mirador, then return to Antiquarian Pajitnova in Windsward.

quests.title: Taken to Task
quests.description: Defeat Kisare the Taskmaster to acquire the Taskmaster's Heart. Then report back to Antiquarian Pajitnova in Windsward.

quests.title: Seeing Clearly (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the Antiquarian's Eyepiece from Simon Grey in Amrine Excavation for Antiquarian Pajitnova in Windsward.

quests.title: Give a Dog a Bone (Expedition)
quests.description: Simon Grey's dog Barkimedes is awaiting his master's return and is very hungry. From what you can tell he would appreciate having some Ravager bones to gnaw on.

quests.title: Bones For Barkimedes (Expedition)
quests.description: Simon Grey's dog Barkimedes is awaiting his master's return and is very hungry. From what you can tell he would appreciate having some Ravager bones to gnaw on.

quests.title: More Bones for Barkimedes (Expedition)
quests.description: Simon Grey's dog Barkimedes wants an enhanced bone-chewing experience from the Enchanted Bones of the Shattered Obelisk expedition.

quests.title: Pushing Back
quests.description: Eliminate the Corrupted in Weeping-and-Gnashing and Corpus Angoris, and recover any supplies left behind. Then report back to Warden Reese in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Our Own Worst Enemy
quests.description: Search for Soulwarden Heartgems across the five forts in Shattered Mountain, and search for any Corrupted writings. Then report back to Ranger Madaki in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: The Illurmin Rift
quests.description: Explore the deadly Illurmin Rift and deliver your discoveries to Warden Linch in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Guardians' Secrets
quests.description: Defeat Guardian Tzi-Wang, recover Baetylus Luckstones, and defeat Rockruins Guardians in Limbus Cavatus. Then report back to Warden Reese in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Alligator Steaks
quests.description: Hunt Shattered Alligators for Gator Steaks and seek out bundles of Mirespice Blend held by the Desolate Scroungers. Then report back to Warden Douglas in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Malevolent Offerings
quests.description: End the rituals in Hewn-from-Hell and Mantled-in-Nettles by eliminating the Corrupted Vicars, their guards, and their Corruption Barbs, then reclaim their Corrupted ritual implements. Then report back to Warden Linch in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Clarion Offensive
quests.description: Defeat Dau-Shin and recover Armor Scraps from the Rockrift Carvers in Limbus Cavatus. Then report back to Warden Fayed in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Knowledge is Power
quests.description: Get a fresh blight sample from a Blight Nodule in Wanhope Wold. Then report back to Ranger Herath in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Blight Resistance
quests.description: Collect a Blight Sample from the Baleful Lair and defeat Fay, the Last Protector. Bring a piece of his remains to Ranger Herath in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Madaki's Stratagem
quests.description: Search the forges of Infernal Host for any weapon molds or crucibles they might be using to forge weapons of great power. Then report back to Ranger Madaki in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Baetylus Headpiece (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat the Cilla in the Lazarus Instrumentality Expedition and Collect the Naga Headdress. Then report back to Warden Reese in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: Ultimate Blight Defense (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat the Alluvium Marl and Collect Alluvium Spores for Ranger Herath in Shattered Mountain.

quests.title: The Tempest's Soul (Expedition)
quests.description: Enter Tempest's Heart and Defeat Isabella de Leon.

quests.title: Isabella De Leon (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about Isabella's past in Spain with her brothers. Then defeat Isabella de Leon again with this new knowledge in mind.

quests.title: Isabella's Corruption (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about how Isabella was offered the mantle of Corruption. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.

quests.title: Rise of Captain Isabella (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about Isabella's descent into cruelty with her crew by investigating the graves where they were buried alive. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.

quests.title: Death of the Heretic (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out about the Heretic's true power and talk to the Heretic. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.

quests.title: The Possession of Russo (Expedition)
quests.description: Find out the truth about Isabella and Father Russo, and what is to come, and talk to Father Russo. Then defeat Isabella de Leon with this new knowledge in mind.

quests.title: Isabella's Madness (Expedition)
quests.description: Recover a shard of Isabella's madness in the ashes of her defeat for Mara Rosa to study.

quests.title: To Be Free
quests.description: Free the baby tigers for Ma Xinyi.

quests.title: Scourging The Scourge
quests.description: Defeat Ivan The Scourge for Elder Danya.

quests.title: Flowers for the Departed
quests.description: Place the flowers at Skysong Crypt to check if Elder Danya's comrades have found peace.

quests.title: The Corrupted Streak
quests.description: Defeat the group of Corrupted tigers for Ma Xinyi and end the cycle.

quests.title: The Mystery Within
quests.description: Help Yue study the Corrupted nodule at Imperial Army Campsite.

quests.title: Treasured Trinkets
quests.description: Recover Chinese heirlooms from the Corrupted and give them to Yue so she can discover more about her past.

quests.title: Sins of the Brothers
quests.description: Help Bardroy's sons, Bartolome and Bartholomew see sense and stop fighting each other.

quests.title: The Show Must Go On
quests.description: Get black ink from Void Pitchers so Magistrate Redridge may complete her play about the Empress.

quests.title: Study In Green
quests.description: Acquire Dryad Wood for Artificer Long to craft robust armor against the Corrupted.

quests.title: Statuette Stash
quests.description: Collect four Statuettes as told by handmaiden Zeng, to disrupt the Corrupted ritual.

quests.title: Family Puzzles
quests.description: Return the puzzle box to Bardroy and discover the prize his sons were fighting to own.

quests.title: Shrine Cleansing
quests.description: Cleanse Skysong Temple for Artificer Long.

quests.title: Legacy Reclaimed
quests.description: Collect Passenger Scrolls from the Corrupted for Yue to study.

quests.title: The Red Claw
quests.description: Collect a Crimson Paw from Redclaw for a red dye for Xiang Enlai.

quests.title: Serenity In Chaos
quests.description: Destroy Corrupted forces at Serenity Monastery. Then report back to Artificer Long.

quests.title: Strings of Fate
quests.description: Retrieve red strings from Dynasty Corrupted for Xiang Enlai and Yue.

quests.title: Revenge of a Playwright
quests.description: Sabotage the Corrupted operations as payback for spoiling Redridge's play.

quests.title: End of Her Reign (Expedition)
quests.description: Defeat Empress Zhou Taiying and her Captains. Then report back to Zeng Lingyun in the Ebonscale Settlement.

quests.title: Justice For The Dynasty (Expedition)
quests.description: Obtain Dynasty Shackles from Dynasty Shipyard Lieutenants and return them to Liberator Guo outside the Dynasty Shipyards In Ebonscale.

quests.title: Secret of the Spores
quests.description: Master Alchemist Eadred has made a revolutionary discovery critical to the invasion. Investigate the strange spores blooming in the region and learn how you can use them to your advantage.\n(Requires: Harvesting 100)

quests.title: Endangered by Artemis
quests.description: The Druid Keira implores you to aid the wildlife native to the region. The cries of animals call out from the depths of the jungle, and she feels their fear. Do what you can to keep them from becoming food for some new monstrosity.

quests.title: A Beast No More
quests.description: Sebastian Vachon is pursuing a dangerous beast and needs your help finding it so he can study its origins. Follow its tracks through the region, defeat it, and bring its cerebrum back to the Druid.

quests.title: Firing Back
quests.description: Albert Riches, the survivalist of First Light left behind some battle plans and a note. How did he know we would be coming? In any case, we should help. Go into Charlottesburgh and complete the Survivalist's bombastic plan.

quests.title: A Friend in Need
quests.description: Another potential survivor, James Oxen, appears to have dropped a check-list of supplies. There is a crude drawing of a cave on the back. Collect the supplies, find the cave, and protect the survivors.

quests.title: Tracking the Herd
quests.description: The Knight-Errant Fionn hopes we can render some assistance investigating the migratory behavior of the beasts moving between the nearby territory and the northern beastlands. Follow the clues and report back.

quests.title: Plague for All Factions
quests.description: Ramla and her crew have come down with a mysterious illness. Something dangerous has awoken in these ruins and someone tough will be needed to investigate. See if you can solve the mystery.

quests.title: Defective Defenses
quests.description: Josephine and her Syndicate specialists were ambushed when they set off some form of automated defense system within Tideswallow. Now they need someone to deal with the Ancient Guardians and finish the repairs.

quests.title: Factions United
quests.description: The flow of power has been restored to the Marauders at Saircor, and Kievan needs help with the final step of the operation. Fight off the Ancient Guardians and assist with the repairs so he can gain control of their defenses.

quests.title: The Heart of a Beast
quests.description: Pinned beneath a mysterious, rusted axe lies a note - addressed to you. It asks that you hold your judgment of the fabled Minotaur until you learn his story. Collect relics lost in the labyrinth, then speak with Marwa.

quests.title: Challenge of Character
quests.description: Marwa Shaheen has heard of your recent exploits, and knows more trials lie ahead. She wishes to offer a challenge to bolster your resolve. Visit Marwa and complete the time trial that she has prepared.

quests.title: Gauntlet of Kings
quests.description: Shirzad believes you must increase in strength if you are to quell the rage of the tainted Beast Lords and their tribes. Return to his den at Shirzad's Pride and once again brave the grotto below.

quests.title: Battle of the Beasts
quests.description: Barug of the Gorillas now stands in Kurok's stead, but without their Lord the tribe is in grave danger. Rally your fellow warriors to help the Gorilla tribe fight off an incursion by a champion of the Lizard Lord.

quests.title: The Tribunal Highmound
quests.description: Manmosu, the new matriarch of the mammoth tribe, has taken refuge in a cave near the Tribunal Highmound to prepare for battle. Speak with her, and then prepare to assault the Highmound and its leaders.

quests.title: Medusa's Monstrosities
quests.description: Johannes Metzger needs assistance investigating the sinister magic Medusa had been channeling in Scalefang Enclave. Reach out to the rogue scientist, help him gather samples, and work with the mysterious technology there.

quests.title: Medusa's Magic
quests.description: Johannes Metzger has even grander ambitions. Too grand to accomplish alone. Find him in the dark village and Help him with his final tasks, and he promises to share part of the credit for whatever he learns.

quests.title: The Siege of Light's Crown
quests.description: Ranger-Captain Hargest has advanced into inner Light's Crown to establish a perimeter, but she needs assistance. Help the rangers restock their munitions, bolster their defenses, and fend off attacks.

quests.title: Essence of Evil
quests.description: Heinrich Gauss has been dispatched to investigate the dark energy pouring out of Elafry Pyrgo and assess its potential danger to the humans of Aeternum. Help him to gather samples using his proprietary capture devices.

quests.title: The Savage Divide (Expedition)
quests.description: The time has come to face the Beast Lords lost within the Savage Divide. Manmosu asks that we act as her champion, lest she risk infection by going herself. Gather your greatest allies, descend into the Divide, and defeat the Lords.

quests.title: Among the Statues
quests.description: Dame Edith Henrietta Shackleton has gotten herself into a bit of a situation in the maze. She requires help acquiring antiquities that have been turned to stone.

quests.title: Containing the Contagion (Expedition)
quests.description: Archdruid Trahern has been hard at work researching methods for combating the magical plants spreading throughout the Savage Divide. He needs your assistance planting his newly created seeds within the depths of the cavern.

quests.title: Smell the Future
quests.description: Arnold Trost has discovered Lost are repulsed by man-sized sticks of burning incense. Venture into The Salty Marshes and light a Lost Deterrence Pylon to keep them out of Spyglass Ridge.

quests.title: Keys to Freedom
quests.description: Spymaster Bronn wants you to cause a distraction in Pirate's Stand by unleashing the encaged Ancient Guardians upon their jailers. With the enemy occupied, find the prison key and release the pirate captives to bolster our ranks.

quests.title: A Shocking Revelation
quests.description: Help Billiam Rowen with the discovery of his lifetime by defeating the Spectral Tyrant and ridding his cave of Lost! Return to Billiam in Cutlass Keys when you've finished.

quests.title: Whispers of Wealth
quests.description: A collector named Edwin Kasper is haunted by a voice that demands the recovery of artifacts lost among the shipwrecks of Cutlass Keys. Search for a golden beam to the south west and return the artifacts to satisfy the mysterious voice and save Kasper's sanity.

quests.title: Soul Trap
quests.description: Rosina Bryce's search for supernatural rumors have led her to The Bloody Spike. Defeat warriors living and dead to collect enough Soul Gems for an offering, and see fortune bestowed by The Bloody Spike.

quests.title: For Guts and Glory
quests.description: Get your hands dirty and defeat other fighters at the Citadel. Return to Decima Opimius when you have a story worth telling.

quests.title: Smell the Future
quests.description: Arnold Trost has discovered Lost are repulsed by man-sized sticks of burning incense. Venture into The Salty Marshes and light a Lost Deterrence Pylon to keep them out of Spyglass Ridge.

quests.title: Keys to Freedom
quests.description: Spymaster Bronn wants you to cause a distraction in Pirate's Stand by unleashing the encaged Ancient Guardians upon their jailers. With the enemy occupied, find the prison key and release the pirate captives to bolster our ranks.

quests.title: A Shocking Revelation
quests.description: Help Billiam Rowen with the discovery of his lifetime by defeating the Spectral Tyrant and ridding his cave of Lost! Return to Billiam in Cutlass Keys when you've finished.

quests.title: Whispers of Wealth
quests.description: A collector named Edwin Kasper is haunted by a voice that demands the recovery of artifacts lost among the shipwrecks of Cutlass Keys. Search for a golden beam to the south west and return the artifacts to satisfy the mysterious voice and save Kasper's sanity.

quests.title: Soul Trap
quests.description: Rosina Bryce's search for supernatural rumors have led her to The Bloody Spike. Defeat warriors living and dead to collect enough Soul Gems for an offering, and see fortune bestowed by The Bloody Spike.

quests.title: For Guts and Glory
quests.description: Get your hands dirty and defeat other fighters at the Citadel. Return to Decima Opimius when you have a story worth telling.

quests.title: Out of the Frying Pan
quests.description: Return the set of pots and pans to Cook Swampy in the Cutlass Keys Settlement.

quests.title: In Search of Plunder
quests.description: Explore Ancient ruins to collect artifacts. Search chests to collect Heron's notes. Talk to Quartermaster Duffy in the Cutlass Keys Settlement when your task is complete.

quests.title: Relics of the Tower
quests.description: Loot relics from chests inside Crow's Nest Lighthouse. Talk to Quartermaster Duffy in the Cutlass Keys Settlement when your task is complete.

quests.title: Explosive Prospecting
quests.description: Investigate the source of the tremors in the Highpass Mining Camp and defuse the situation. Talk to Captain Lucian in Spyglass Ridge when the task is complete.

quests.title: Lightning in a Bottle
quests.description: Find elemental materials from spirits and bring them back to Artificer Fei in the Cutlass Keys Settlement.

quests.title: Lightning Unleashed
quests.description: Place the Lightning Jars in locations around Fort Barnacles. Talk to Artificer Fei in the Cutlass Keys Settlement when the task is complete.

quests.title: Animal Instincts
quests.description: Gather samples from wildcats and alligators and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys so he can study how to tame them.

quests.title: Snaggletooth
quests.description: Collect a tooth from a fierce lion and bring it to Tosch in Cutlass Keys.

quests.title: Catnipping
quests.description: Gather whiskers from island pumas and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys.

quests.title: Taming the Lionhearted
quests.description: Gather collars and leashes from tamed dogs and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys.

quests.title: Perfect Companion
quests.description: Gather boar bristles and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys so he may tame the ultimate pet!

quests.title: A Disturbing Silence
quests.description: Search for Jocelyn at Castaway's Colony. Talk to Swamp Walker Nekumanesh in Cutlass Keys when the task is complete.

quests.title: Tracking by Teeth
quests.description: Track Jocelyn by finding her teeth in River's Crossing. Talk to Swamp Walker Nekumanesh in Cutlass Keys when the task is complete.

quests.title: Heart of the Marsh
quests.description: Find Jocelyn and recover a keepsake from her. Talk to Swamp Walker Nekumanesh in Cutlass Keys when the task is complete.

quests.title: Treasure Island
quests.description: Follow the treasure map Claire provided to discover great riches! Talk to Claire Fergus in Cutlass Keys when the task is done.

quests.title: Admiral Blackpowder's Fall (Expedition)
quests.description: Enter the Barnacles and Black Powder Expedition. Gather the chronicles of the infamous Admiral Blackpowder, and take him down for Wally Widdershins.

quests.title: Mysteries of the Deep (Expedition)
quests.description: Enter the Barnacles and Black Powder Expedition to disrupt the work of a suspected Water Elemental for Rowan Pennbrook.

quests.title: Cleansing Treasure (Expedition)
