quests.description: Enter the Barnacles and Black Powder Expedition to collect golden trinkets from the crewmembers. Bring them back to Quiggley Quorus to cleanse and sell them.

quests.title: Cleansing Treasure (Expedition)
quests.description: Enter the Barnacles and Black Powder Expedition to collect golden trinkets from the crewmembers. Bring them back to Quiggley Quorus to cleanse and sell them.

quests.title: Out of the Frying Pan
quests.description: Return the set of pots and pans to Cook Swampy in the Cutlass Keys Settlement.

quests.title: Relics of the Tower
quests.description: Loot relics from chests inside Crow's Nest Lighthouse. Talk to Quartermaster Duffy in the Cutlass Keys Settlement when your task is complete.

quests.title: Explosive Prospecting
quests.description: Investigate the source of the tremors in the Highpass Mining Camp and defuse the situation. Talk to Captain Lucian in Spyglass Ridge when the task is complete.

quests.title: Lightning in a Bottle
quests.description: Find elemental materials from spirits and bring them back to Artificer Fei in the Cutlass Keys Settlement.

quests.title: Lightning Unleashed
quests.description: Place the Lightning Jars in locations around Fort Barnacles. Talk to Artificer Fei in the Cutlass Keys Settlement when the task is complete.

quests.title: Animal Instincts
quests.description: Gather samples from wildcats and alligators and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys so he can study how to tame them.

quests.title: Snaggletooth
quests.description: Collect a tooth from a fierce lion and bring it to Tosch in Cutlass Keys.

quests.title: Catnipping
quests.description: Gather whiskers from island pumas and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys.

quests.title: Taming the Lionhearted
quests.description: Gather collars and leashes from tamed dogs and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys.

quests.title: Perfect Companion
quests.description: Gather boar bristles and bring them to Tosch in Cutlass Keys so he may tame the ultimate pet!

quests.title: Treasure Island
quests.description: Follow the treasure map Claire provided to discover great riches! Talk to Claire Fergus in Cutlass Keys when the task is done.

quests.title: Death and Duty
quests.description: Defeat the former Watcher Antonio Guerra, find any scouting reports at his camp, and put his soul to rest. Then report back to Magistrate Wallace in the Mourningdale Settlement.

quests.title: Tears in Rain
quests.description: Defeat Spirits at Stephen's Claim to Collect Teardrop Gems. Then report back to Artificer Wrightson in the Mourningdale Settlement.

quests.title: Silver Tongue, Golden Coins
quests.description: Recover the gold medallions from Padre Nuez at his Mansion. Then report back to Artificer Wrightson in the Mourningdale Settlement.

quests.title: Hearth and Home
quests.description: Clear Weeper enemies from Porridgepot. Then report back to Constable Bayles in the Mourningdale Settlement.

quests.title: Lost in the Flood
quests.description: Investigate the ruins in the Flooded Plains, and return found artifacts to Gildon in Mourningdale.

quests.title: The Broken Road
quests.description: Defeat Novaguard foot soldiers in the lookouts along the Ancient Road, and give their armor scraps to Gildon in Mourningdale.

quests.title: Look Back in Anger
quests.description: Defeat Fineseer foot soldiers while climbing to the top of Vela, and show its treasure to Gildon in Mourningdale.

quests.title: Misfortunes Multiply
quests.description: Defeat Musslebeard and the Seasong pirates in his charge. Then report back to Magistrate Wallace in Mourningdale.

quests.title: Corruption's Call
quests.description: Defeat the Redeyes and destroy Spewspitter's emblem in New Balefire, then return to Gildon in Mourningdale.

quests.title: Best Laid Plans
quests.description: Investigate key locations to the north that have been taken by the Wardogs. Then report back to Magistrate Wallace in Mourningdale.

quests.title: When it Rains, it Pours
quests.description: The Mourningdale settlement has been struck by tragedy and is in disarray. Constable Bayles will fill you in.

quests.title: Ode to Aeternum
quests.description: Pierre Auguste would like new tales of Aeternum, but is too timid to travel himself. Write a collection of odes to the scenic locations described in Pierre's guidebook.

quests.title: Stone Cold Secrets
quests.description: Follow Leilani's clues, written on your map, to complete her last adventure and find three lost artifacts of Ancient construction.

quests.title: The Last Mystery
quests.description: Travel to three locations marked on your map and investigate whether Leilani's key can be used at each.

quests.title: A Toast to Adventure
quests.description: Bring Leilani's Special Order to the Bartender in the Mourningdale Tavern.

quests.title: Amateur Adventurer
quests.description: Follow the trail of clues to find where Pierre has gone.

quests.title: Song of the Sea
quests.description: Find the Captain's lost Shanty Book and Hurdy-Gurdy.

quests.title: Village Champion
quests.description: Recover Lerato's Heirloom armor and sword from the Corrupted in Ceremony and return them to her at the crossroads.

quests.title: Malign Dominion
quests.description: Find and destroy Malign Nodes at each of three Corrupt checkpoints along the road, then return to Harunobu at the crossroads. Some of these nodes are out of reach, you may need to bring a ranged weapon.

quests.title: Makin' Bacon
quests.description: Harvest Mourning Pigs in Hibbotsfeld for Harunobu and return them to him at the crossroads.

quests.title: Soul Music
quests.description: Clear away the Withered around the Ancient Head so that Jan Jaansen can better hear the mysterious voice.

quests.title: Following the Bard's Song
quests.description: Search the coastal roads for Jan Jaansen

quests.title: New Perspective
quests.description: Get to the end of Presage Pier and look for inspiration for the next stanza of Jan's epic.

quests.title: Harmonic Resonance
quests.description: Follow Jan Jaansen's inspiration to the location foretold in Jan's inspiration.

quests.title: Welcome to Mourningdale
quests.description: Find Harunobu, recently of Hibbotsfeld.

quests.title: The People in the Neighborhood
quests.description: Bring a sample of Harunobu's roast pork to Lerato.

quests.title: Seasoned Adventurer
quests.description: Race Pierre home to the Mourningdale Settlement

quests.title: Flowers for the Heir
quests.description: The True Heir is returning to Monarch's Bluffs! Fiona Murphy has asked you to bring Avalon Lilies to Pendragon Landing as a tribute.

quests.title: The Anniversary Gift
quests.description: Edda Koning wants you to remind her husband, Eddie Koning it's their anniversary. Carry the message to Cynefin Mine.

quests.title: Pick of the Mines
quests.description: Prydwen is short on resources. Cemal, the Master Builder has asked you to retrieve the miners' picks so that he may melt them into iron.

quests.title: Blow 'Em Down!
quests.description: Squire Ashe needs your help to blow up a bunch of pirates at Brysedd Shore.

quests.title: A Wife's Mirror
quests.description: A wistful Hugo Molina has asked you to help him find the missing fragments of his Lost wife's mirror.

quests.title: The Maidens Lost
quests.description: Nabi has asked for evidence to prove getting married is not the answer to turning Lost. Hopefully, this will get her meddlesome marriage-minded mother off her back.

quests.title: Dentistry Artistry
quests.description: Hamza Killic's brain is dancing with a new idea. Collect wolf fangs so that he may bring his invention to life!

quests.title: Heart of Glass
quests.description: A grieving Olivia Barovier has asked you to retrieve her Lost father's glassworks from Arruda Ranch.

quests.title: Ending the Madness
quests.description: Fixing the mirror for Hugo worsened matters. He needs your help breaking the large mirror at Deadman's Cove, so that he can finally let go of his Lost wife.

quests.title: A Useless Hope
quests.description: Dayo Musa's hopeful plan went horribly wrong. Retrieve the amulets from the Lost to put them at ease and return the amulets to him.

quests.title: The Aspiring Knight
quests.description: Ashe Dubois, Ser Payne's squire, has always longed to be a knight. Give her the proof that someone in her family used to be a knight once.

quests.title: Devil Honey
quests.description: Get combs of Devil's Honey from Geertie Lother's private reserve at Hiraeth Lookout and return them to her in Prydwen.

quests.title: Old World Wine
quests.description: Celebrate while you still can. Collect jars of Old World wine from Brysedd Shore and share them with Geertie Lother.

quests.title: Resources for Prydwen
quests.description: Collect Stone, Wood and Leather for Cemal Qadir, Prydwen's Master Builder, so that he can build good defenses for Prydwen.

quests.title: A Sword for a Friend
quests.description: Cemal Qadir is very happy with the work you've done and wants to do something for you in turn. Learn how to build a sword with his guidance.

quests.title: The Town Project Board
quests.description: Visit the Town Project Board of Monarch's Bluffs and find tasks to help the people of the settlement.

quests.title: Down Payment
quests.description: Track down the workers who betrayed Giacomo

quests.title: Down Payment
quests.description: Track down the workers who betrayed Giacomo

quests.title: Down Payment
quests.description: Track down the workers who betrayed Giacomo

quests.title: Down Payment
quests.description: Track down the workers who betrayed Giacomo

quests.title: A Major Purchase
quests.description: Purchase a home, and place some decorations within

quests.title: Insuring the Investment
quests.description: Travel to Shatterwall and the Fong Family Orchard to collect fresh Withered blood and bones for Giacomo

quests.title: Insuring the Investment (Part 2)
quests.description: Gather Grave Nettles from Nettlerest Graveyard, and bring them back to Giacomo

quests.title: Site Inspection
quests.description: Gather the construction materials for Giacomo, and investigate the information on the next traitor

quests.title: Mandatory Improvements
quests.description: Collect the materials for Giacomo's recipe, then craft the Ancient Protection Stones at an Arcane Repository

quests.title: Closing Cost
quests.description: Track down Airic Niclisson, the leader of those who betrayed Giacomo

quests.title: Desire For A Child
quests.description: Primrose has asked you to find her darling daughter, Hazel. Your search starts at her childhood home in Hakenstadt.

quests.title: The Truth Behind Transmutations
quests.description: Hazel has been experimenting with forbidden life magic. Continue your search further east in Krummholm.

quests.title: The Hope Of The Living
quests.description: Primrose fears what her daughter may have done. Find Hazel and bring her safely back home.

quests.title: Starting the Fire
quests.description: Gather strange torches from Richmire region and bring them to Torchy Cabrera in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Burning from the Inside
quests.description: Collect Perpetual Illumination Essences from Ancients at Aqua Acadia and bring them to Torchy Cabrera in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Hellfire & Brimstone Oven
quests.description: Travel to Navarro's Kitchen and defeat Chef Navarro and collect "Navarro's Flaming Duck Recipe". Then bring it to Torchy in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Denying The Denier
quests.description: Travel to Periville, slay the Denier, and bring proof of its demise to Evelyn Van Heck in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Keeping the Faith
quests.description: Travel to Periville and find Joan and Markus. Report back to Evelyn Van Heck in Weaver's Fen with news of their fate.

quests.title: A Well-Earned Respite
quests.description: Travel to Karburg, slay Ruiz Velazquez, and bring proof of his demise to Evelyn Van Heck in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Gators Gone Wild
quests.description: Collect alligator scales from Gators in Weaver's Fen and return them to Hunter Samuel in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: No Mere Pigs
quests.description: Collect boar tusks from Polder Boars in Weaver's Fen and return them to Hunter Samuel just north of the settlement.

quests.title: The True Contest
quests.description: Collect wolf paws from Mallory Wolves, found north of Fenton's Hamlet, and return them to Hunter Samuel in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Stalk of Shame
quests.description: Defeat the Werna Packleader at Dusty Paw Burrow, far to the north and west of Weavers Fen Hamlet, and collect a trophy from your kill for Hunter Samuel in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Story of the Stones
quests.description: Gather stone samples from rubble in the nearby ruins. Then report back to Architect Na Li in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Spanning the Ages
quests.description: Gather stone samples from rubble at South Vega Bridge. Then report back to Architect Na Li in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Deep Time
quests.description: Gather stone samples from rubble at Andrometus. Then report back to Architect Na Li in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: That Beautiful Stench
quests.description: Gather materials in Weaver's Fen and then visit an arcane repository to craft a perfume for Tullius Volusus in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Misplaced Treasure
quests.description: Search chests at North Vega Bridge for a clue to Noras whereabouts. Then report back to Leonie Roggeveen in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Following Nora
quests.description: Search chests at Canopus for a clue to Noras whereabouts. Then report back to Leonie Roggeveen in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Odds in Her Favor
quests.description: Follow Nora's trail to Aqua Acadia and search chests for the final clue.

quests.title: Nora, Found
quests.description: Return to Dr. Leonie Roggeveen in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: The Nose Knows
quests.description: Find someone who can make bear repellent, as a favor to Dr. Theophrastus. Then, distribute the repellent to the researchers in the field.

quests.title: Hazard Pay (Expedition)
quests.description: Percy Ellwood is searching for valuable Ancient Artifacts from Garden of Genesis

quests.title: Parted in Anger
quests.description: Speak to members of the Cult of Renewal to learn what happened to Han Fang's daughter, Han Liu.

quests.title: The Cult of Renewal
quests.description: Find Han Liu by joining her on the Cult of Renewal's so-called "Path of Truth."

quests.title: Walking Wyrds
quests.description: Complete your own Path of Truth by planting an imbued seed at each of the Angry Earth shrines within the Wyrdwood Twists. Help Han Liu do the same by clearing the path of Angry Earth.

quests.title: Spoken Wyrds
quests.description: Talk to Han Fang about taking the oath to officially join the Cult of Renewal.

quests.title: A Sword in my Stead
quests.description: Try to talk Han Liu out of undergoing a difficult rite and help her succeed if she insists on going anyway.

quests.title: One of Us
quests.description: Venture to Buggane Hedge and harvest herbs for a calming tea from the hides of dryads.

quests.title: Something to Celebrate
quests.description: Venture into the verdant forests of Edengrove to harvest colorful flowers in celebration of the returning cultists.

quests.title: Waste Not, Want Not
quests.description: Retrieve the fallen belongings of cultists who have failed their final rite.

quests.title: Where You Go, I Will Follow
quests.description: Help Han Fang reunite with Han Liu.

quests.title: Medicinal Qualities
quests.description: Collect medicinal herbs from Lough Du Lac swamp to help Sai Khanam recover from her wounds.

quests.title: Thieves in the Night
quests.description: Find and retrieve Sai Khanam's stolen belongings.

quests.title: Here, Boy!
quests.description: Help Sai Khanam track down her wolf companion.

quests.title: Scout's Big Secret
quests.description: Return to Sai Khanam and give her the totem Scout gave you.

quests.title: The Work You Undid
quests.description: Replant the medicinal herbs you stole to their proper place within Lough Du Lac.

quests.title: Waiting on the Wind
quests.description: Now that the wind is right, climb to the top of the bridge Avernal Verdure and burst the plant bulbs to release their pollen.

quests.title: Even Greater Heights
quests.description: Help Hedera expand her garden by climbing the ruins and planting a flower seed at its highest point.

quests.title: Hold Your Breath
quests.description: Destroy the strange flowers clinging to the rocks, ideally without breathing in their scent.

quests.title: A Dark Compulsion
quests.description: Clear the path to the north and west to allow Ranger Yasin to pass unharmed to wherever it is he is going.

quests.title: Crying Out for Love
quests.description: Ascend the rise and light a bonfire to help signal Ranger Yasin's presence to his "love."

quests.title: Out of His Misery
quests.description: Speak to the dryad Hedera to find a way to rid Ranger Yasin of his affliction.

quests.title: The Pioneer's Lament
quests.description: Help a doomed farmer move on with his life.

quests.title: Art is Suffering
quests.description: Deface an avant-garde sculptress's embarrassing early work.

quests.title: Heart Beats Hate
quests.description: Harvest the heart of Aeternum's angriest Dryad Brute, for science.

quests.title: Wyldwood Water
quests.description: Find the Wyldwood Water recipe for Antara.

quests.title: Everywhere Friends
quests.description: Understand the message Antara's mother wanted to convey through the Wyldwood Water.

quests.title: Incomparable Blue
quests.description: Return the misplaced easel to Pietr Wolcott.

quests.title: Lupine Observations
quests.description: Defeat Fangsnap in Fangsnap's Den for Survivalist Wilson in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: Pirates Will Pirate
quests.description: Defeat Neptunite Pirates and collect Pirate Booty from chests for Constable Muller in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: War of the Lost
quests.description: Defeat Seele's Withered at the Decayed Campsite for Magistrate Gurkin in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: The Greater Threat
quests.description: Kill Eastshore Forces at the Eastshore Pier and Gather Fishing Supplies for Magistrate Gurkin in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: Disarmament
quests.description: Confiscate grenades from chests and destroy Ching Shih the Shark for Artificer Taethen in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: Slaying the Shadowslayer
quests.description: Kill Erika the Shadowslayer in Solitude Cemetery for Artificer Taethen in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: Where The Boars Roam
quests.description: Defeat Boars and Tuskgore at Boarsholm for Survivalist Wilson in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: Scouting Report
quests.description: Destroy Channelview Pirates in Channelview Post and Oceanview Pirates in Oceanview Post and look for anything suspicious. Then report back to Constable Muller in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: Damnation's Fall
quests.description: Defeat Admiral Reis in the center ship of Fort Damnation. Then report back to Constable Muller in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: Paying Respects
quests.description: Travel to Mourningdale and convey Barkeep Andris's respects to Barkeep Brewell.

quests.title: Archdeacon Azamela (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect the head of Archdeacon Azamela in The Depths for Magistrate Gurkin.

quests.title: Hoppy Trails
quests.description: Visit Rabbit Island and if you can find any signs of a curse then deal with them and then return to Survivalist Wilson in the Restless Shores Settlement.

quests.title: The First Thing I Remember
quests.description: Discover Santiago Salazar's past by confronting members of his former crew and tracking down a ship manifest and their journal entries.

quests.title: Footsteps on the Beach
quests.description: Retrace Santiago Salazars steps to find what he placed in a chest and recover Rosario's Manifest from one of his previous crewmembers.

quests.title: The True Terror of the Seas
quests.description: Confront Santiago Salazar's previous captain Scurvyhook, and extract revenge to put Santiago's mind at ease.

quests.title: A Pirate's Life
quests.description: Follow a trail of Doubloons to reclaim the treasure Santiago's old crew had stashed away years ago.

quests.title: Broken Communication
quests.description: Recover Myrtilus's Bow from the Angry Earth at Pisces.

quests.title: Spined Ammunition
quests.description: Recover Myrtilus's Quiver and Thornpoint Arrows from the Angry Earth at Fornax.

quests.title: Trail Rations
quests.description: Recover Nutrient Stalks from containers at Eridanus for Myrtilus.

quests.title: Unnatural Habitation
quests.description: Search Clawpoint Ruins for any clues as to why there are lynx in the area.

quests.title: A Hair's Breadth from Danger
quests.description: Search the poacher's camp for any letters about their activities.

quests.title: Rule of Tooth and Claw
quests.description: Right the wrongs done to the local wolf pack.

quests.title: Fisherman's Allure
quests.description: Search for treasure at Poseidon's Plunder for Wafa Keles.

quests.title: Treasured Company
quests.description: Bring a letter from Wafa Keles to Xue Tian

quests.title: Not Another Fish in the Sea
quests.description: Recover Xue's Sea Glass Charms from the Treetop pirates that stole them.

quests.title: Meat For Nekumanesh (Expedition)
quests.description: Collect Hunks of Meat for Nekumanesh the alligator from Corrupted Leaders in The Depths Expedition.

quests.title: Wispy Spritz Bombs
quests.description: The Bloom Herald offers to share the secret to true freedom if a rare blossom, the Wispy Bloom, can be safely collected.

quests.title: Springtide Bloom
quests.description: Armed with the Wispy Spritz bomb, the Bloom Herald has requested that the precious petals of the Wispyblooms be collected and brought to her in order to further the quest for harmony.

quests.title: The Missing Praetorians
quests.description: Captain Andrea Clermont has asked you to find her fellow Praetorians. If they've become Lost, help them find peace and bring back proof of their defeat.

quests.title: Personal Demons
quests.description: Discover if Praetorian Malatesta still lives. If he has become Lost, defeat him and retrieve his insignia

quests.title: Duties Maintained
quests.description: Take Captain Clermonts reports back to Prefect Severan in New Corsica.

quests.title: Roar of the Manticore
quests.description: Inside the Acropolis, investigate the threats that plague the trade route.

quests.title: Audience with the Pontifex
quests.description: Prelate Razin has blocked you from speaking with Pontifex Charmion until you have gained an understanding of the True Gods, and the threat posed the Legion. Read the Legacy of Rome, then speak with the Prelate again.

quests.title: Power of the Gods
quests.description: Pontifex Charmion has requested that you seek out Pontiff Nuru in the Cradle of Nu and offer her aid.

quests.title: The Sleeping Vessels
quests.description: Search the wreckage for materials to craft Pontiff Nurus relic.

quests.title: Gems of the Immortals
quests.description: Pontiff Nuru has asked you to defeat Anubian Automata and Constructs, and collect the gems they possess.

quests.title: Awakening Anubis
quests.description: Pontiff Nuru has asked you to use the holy relic at the sarcophagus to awaken the Hand of Anubis.

quests.title: Insufficient Faith
quests.description: Report Pontiff Nurus failure to awaken the Anubian vessels to Pontifex Charmion.

quests.title: Cursed Across Centuries
quests.description: Speak with Ariel Gideon about the plan to fight the 19th Legion, then find Tribune Kraus on the Scorched Battlefield.

quests.title: Assault Against the Legion
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to defeat 19th Legion troops in their war camps.

quests.title: The Hydra's Breath
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to steal Hydras Breath from the 19th Legion to help destroy the enemy's siege weapons.

quests.title: A Blaze of Glory
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to destroy the 19th Legion's artillery and defeat Primus Vespasian.

quests.title: The Last True Centurion
quests.description: Tribune Kraus has asked you to find and restore the New Corsican hero Evandrus.

quests.title: A Legend Restored
quests.description: Inform the newly awakened Evandrus of the current invasion then report back to Tribune Kraus.

quests.title: A Hero No More
quests.description: Inform Evandrus that Charmion commands him to return to New Corsica.

quests.title: Ultimate Intentions
quests.description: Evandrus has asked that you infiltrate the Corrupted Legion camp and steal their communications.

quests.title: Strength and Weakness
quests.description: Destroy the 19th Legion's supplies and slay Centurion Magnus.

quests.title: One Tribune at a Time
quests.description: In order to weaken Drusilla, you must take out her tribunes, one by one.

quests.title: Head of the Snake
quests.description: Destroy the Legions command tents and defeat Prefect Drusilla.

quests.title: Sic Transit Gloria Mundi
quests.description: Return to Charmion with news of your success against Drusilla's forces.

quests.title: Secrets in the Sands
quests.description: Speak to Pontiff Nuru at the Ancients' Rise and help her uncover the secrets of the Ennead.

quests.title: Miracles and Madness
quests.description: Recover Charmions journal and the Great Ennead Codex to reveal the secrets of Akhet.

quests.title: Hieratic Truth
quests.description: You must gather pieces of the Prime Key.

quests.title: The Key that was Broken
quests.description: Destroy the Lore Keeper and reforge the Prime Key.

quests.title: Circles in Time
quests.description: Report what you have discovered about Akhet and the reforged Prime Key to Evandrus.

quests.title: The Mighty Must Fall (Expedition)
quests.description: Evandrus has asked you to go to the Ennead and confront his father General Crassus.

quests.title: The Final Seal (Expedition)
quests.description: Enter the Pyramid of Akhet and seal the Ennead with the Prime Key to protect the people of Aeternum.

quests.title: Secret in the Desert
quests.description: With Apophis no longer a threat, Imhotep has turned his attention to matters closer to home. He has asked assistance in recovering a precious and mysterious parcel, buried long ago.

quests.title: A Queen Revealed
quests.description: Ghazi's true identity has been revealed - Cleopatra VII Thea Philopater, Queen of Egypt! Her return would bring hope to the people of New Corsica, but Evandrus may have other ideas. Speak with him to determine his feelings.

quests.title: The Coronation
quests.description: With Evandrus's support, Cleopatra has consented to retake her position of power. Inform all of New Corsica of her return, then attend her coronation at the Royal Pavilion.

quests.title: Tremors in the Sand
quests.description: One of Imhotep's allies, Lysandra, has sent warning of strange events in the sands. Imhotep has asked you to seek her out and assist her in determining their cause.

quests.title: The Ancient Glyphs
quests.description: William Heron seeks an intrepid adventurer to search for Ancient Glyphs. Collect the glyph at the ruins of Satet, discover its purpose, and return to Heron in New Corsica.

quests.title: Scarab Secrets
quests.description: Eudoxia Dalassema needs someone willing to crack open Anubian Scarab Constructs and mine out the power sources within--preferably without alerting the authorities in New Corsica.

quests.title: Lone Jackal
quests.description: Slay the jackals of Deadwater Den who attacked Senhyris, and find some medicine to treat her wounds.

quests.title: Ruffled Feathers
quests.description: Nesse van Baten wants revenge on "Featherbane" the lion, who has developed an unfortunate taste for domestic poultry. Go to Two-Stones Grotto, then meet back up with Nesse at the nearby Outpost.

quests.title: Aggressive Negotiations
quests.description: Huang Xiaoling is looking for a man who may have shipwrecked on the southern coast of Brimstone Sands. Search for any survivors at The Offering, then meet up with Xiaoling at Cavalier's Rest.

quests.title: Broken Pedestals
quests.description: Froderico Renaldi is beside himself after being murdered just outside Castrum Inferos. Recover the unfortunate historian's belongings from the Castrum, and return them to him.

quests.title: An Ancient Balancing Act
quests.description: Perrin Mercier discovered a tantalizing mystery in the collapsed Roman aqueduct, but can't climb it himself. Brave the treacherous ascent into the aqueduct, then return to Perrin with your findings.

quests.title: Coming Forth by Day
quests.description: Acolyte Miresis seeks Egyptian funerary rites from his former mentor Psherenamun, who has become Lost. Seek out Psherenamun at Castrum Perdita, take the texts from him, and return to Saboteur's Hideaway.

quests.title: The Insatiable Flame
quests.description: Bring delicious fish to the Insatiable Flame before he decides to make a snack out of you. You can catch fresh fish from any fishing hotspot in Brimstone Sands.

quests.title: Artistic License
quests.description: Enez de Barros is convinced that there are dragon eggs at the Palace of Nekhbet. Search the reptile nests for eggs of any sort, and bring them back for Enez's inspection.

quests.title: Path of the Devourer
quests.description: Lysandra is distressed by strange tremors that have recently rocked the Great Pyramid of Akhet. Survey the area around the pyramid's base, and find evidence of what is causing the tremors.

quests.title: The Antiquarian's Dream
quests.description: Emboldened by your success at the aqueduct, Perrin seeks your help to unlock the function of an Ancient stone gateway. Look for clues in the ruins of Hermopolis, then return to Perrin at the Great Shrine of Thoth.

quests.title: The Queen's Brood (Elite)
quests.description: The naturalist Tamouthis is concerned by the sudden and unnatural proliferation of massive scorpions in the Bubasteum. Venture into the Beds of Ta-Bitjet and slay the scorpion queen who lives there.

quests.title: The Gods' Demand
quests.description: The priest Paubastis needs you to venture near the temple ruins of Henkhisesui, slay a lion, and bring back its heart. He promises good payment but refuses to explain why.

quests.title: Flower of the Sands
quests.description: Collect Cactus Flowers in memory of Zahur's husband and bring them to him in the Camp.

quests.title: Sand Walkers
quests.description: Defeat the Sand Walkers in The Acropolis for Tahirah.

quests.title: Honoring the 19th
quests.description: Confiscate Pickaxes from the Corrupted 19th, and recover their Legion Insignias for Acario Clemon.

quests.title: On Duty, the Sun Never Sets
quests.description: Once Priestess of the Lamp of Osiris, Qabalah asks you to destroy the Ancient Guardians that contol the temple and retrieve the sacred Spark of Osiris from the Lamplighter. The Lamplighter ascends the ruins at day, but descends into a hidden chamber at night.

quests.title: The Secret of the Baths
quests.description: Thermae Alchemist Clarisse Vesta has asked you to collect Embalming Salts from the sarcophagi in Jupiter's Grove for the Roman baths in New Corsica. Deliver them to Host Habibah in the city.

quests.title: Honor's End
quests.description: A Roman is searching for memoriabelia of his departed friends.

quests.title: A Warm Medleyfaire Welcome
quests.description: Welcome to Summer Medleyfaire! Interact with the Summer Deposit Boxes and collect the instruments placed around the Summer Village.

quests.title: Maudlinbug Haze
quests.description: Travel to a Maudlinbug Swarmand perform the Maudlinbug Haze with a guitar equipped to collect Maudlinbug Bait and Maudlindust.

quests.title: Sturgeon Song
quests.description: Catch an Aeternum Sturgeon in any open water source using Maudlinbugs as bait. Locate Aeternum Sturgeon Fishing Hotspotsfor an extra angling boost!

quests.title: Stagecraft
quests.description: Mend the Carpenter's Bench for Susanne Weber to join the Medleyfaire.

quests.title: Flower Power
quests.description: Water Flowers for Bak Ye-Jun to join the Medleyfaire.

quests.title: Bees in Bonnets
quests.description: Tend to Disturbed Apiraries for Luis Morales to join the Medleyfaire.

quests.title: Sweet Treats
quests.description: Clean the Baking Ovens so Mischa Balchunas can join the Medleyfaire.

quests.title: Magnum Opus
quests.description: Dance to give inspiration to Blaise Thomas to join the Medleyfaire.

quests.title: Spreading the Cheer
quests.description: Play music at various locations to advertise the Summer Medleyfaire.

quests.title: Faction Introductions
quests.description: I should speak with the Faction Representatives to learn more about joining a Faction.

quests.title: Learn to Craft
quests.description: I should speak with Cemal Qadir about learning a crafting trade.

quests.title: Learn to Craft
quests.description: I should speak with Talesa Serrano about learning a crafting trade.

quests.title: Acquire a Mount
quests.description: I should seek out Jochi Khan in Everfall to see what he has to teach me.

quests.title: To Unpathed Waters
quests.description: Collect firefly bait for Perronelle le Noir.

quests.title: And Undreamed Shores
quests.description: Cast, hook, and reel in three fish for Perronelle.

quests.title: The Good Squire
quests.description: See Perronelle's assistant, Khadijah Bahri, to continue the fishing quests

quests.title: This Melancholy Bait
quests.description: Catch something other than fish, namely one Snail in Fresh Water and one Clam in Salt Water. Next, salvage them for resources.

quests.title: The Idle Squire
quests.description: See Perronelle's other assistant, Urashima Ishii, to continue the fishing quests

quests.title: Thou Deboshed Fish!
quests.description: Increase your catch rate by fishing from a Hotspot three times.

quests.title: Gilded Tombs do Worms Enfold
quests.description: Help Urashima with his work by catching fifteen fish anywhere.

quests.title: The Woe of Squires
quests.description: See Khadijah Bahri to get an update on Perronelle.

quests.title: Rots From the Head Down
quests.description: Catch eight fish greater than 20 inches in length, for love of the craft. It's what Perronelle would want.

quests.title: The Regent's Wounds
quests.description: Check on Perronelle le Noir.

quests.title: Depths Close Round About
quests.description: Solve the mystery of Gladys by collecting one Squid Ink and one Catfish Whisker after salvaging Hooked Squid and Barbed Catfish.

quests.title: The Fisher King Returned
quests.description: Fish for the spawn of Gladys so that Pelles can scrape off their essence and save Perronelle.

quests.title: My Kingdom for a Horse
quests.description: The son of a legendary warlord has built a stable in hopes that the return of the Beast Lords will mean he can put his horse training skills to use.

quests.title: Hungry as a Horse
quests.description: Jochi has given you the ingredients to make Basic Mount Vittles. Craft them at any kitchen or campsite.

quests.title: Hoofing It
quests.description: Seek out Franois De La Rama in Weaver's Fen for additional races.

quests.title: On the Scent
quests.description: Franois de La Rama has asked that I seek out a Varangian named Valencia Iznov, saying she might have the secret to riding wolves. I should look for her in Great Cleave and see if I can earn her trust.

quests.title: A Pack of Knaves
quests.description: A defector of the Varangian Order seeks aid to free a pack of dire wolves from her former compatriots.

quests.title: Desert Dash
quests.description: Satiah Rahmotep is collecting a book of records of Aeternum. She has laid out truly challenging courses for those riders who would seek immortal fame.

quests.title: A Matter of Pride
quests.description: Satiah Rahmotep has suggested that I seek out Zinnumun in the Elysian Wilds to further my riding training.

quests.title: The Lion's Lament
quests.description: Zinnumun, matriarch of the Elysian lions, summons Aeternum's greatest hero to liberate her mate Kaluru from the clutches of pretender Lion Lords that seek to end the growing alliance between man and beast.

quests.title: Hermit's Rally
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Radiant Hills Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Stolen Shores Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: King's Road Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Dogma Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Ghosts and Groves Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Vega Bridge Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Diver's Bluff Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Iron Rose Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Thieves' Way Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Flood and Folly Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Temple of Tears Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Downhill Rush Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Wolf's Bane Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Ancient Alley Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Snows and Spirits Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Rally of the Gods
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Skysong Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Pilgrimage of Light Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Four Seasons Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Barrens and Bogs Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Emerald Run Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Hanging Gardens Rally
quests.description: Reach each checkpoint then cross the finish line within the time limit.

quests.title: Warrior's Reprise Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Island Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Sands and Storms Tour
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Warrior's Path Circuit
quests.description: Jochi Khan has asked me to build a bond between me and my horse by completing the Warrior's Path Circuit.

quests.title: Smuggler's Ring Circuit
quests.description: Franois has posted 5 new races around Weaver's Fen. Complete them to improve your riding skills.

quests.title: White Howl Circuit
quests.description: In order to better bond with my wolf, I need to run the circuit set up by Valencia Iznov.

quests.title: Codex Aeternum Circuit
quests.description: Challenge the race times set by Satiah Rahmotep, and prove you can beat the times set by the ancients.

quests.title: Beast Lord Circuit
quests.description: Zinnumun has set me to train on the same courses they use to teach their young. I must show I can match or beat the times set by hunting lions.

quests.title: Barrens and Bogs Tour II
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Barrens and Bogs Tour II
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Barrens and Bogs Tour II
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: Barrens and Bogs Tour II
quests.description: Plot a route to the finish line and get there within the time limit.

quests.title: The Silver Crows
quests.description: Grace O'Malley has developed a plan to found an enterprising new group of heroes who can work together to face the threats of Aeternum and possibly earn a little coin in the process.

quests.title: The Best of Aeternum
quests.description: The Silver Crows need more members. Work with Grace to find additional heroes to join the group.

quests.title: Zander the Undying
quests.description: Grace has a great candidate in mind. Locate Zander the Undying and convince him to join the Crows.

quests.title: Canon and Coin
quests.description: Help Zander find a way out of his organization.

quests.title: The Empyrean Forge (Expedition)
quests.description: Shailyn wants to uncover what Loth and his Varangians are doing in the Forge. Help her find Loth.

quests.title: A Toymaker's Request (Expedition)
quests.description: Otmar is interested in collecting rare Apatite Gems to make runeglass to make his "toys." Help him find the gems in the Empyrean Forge.

quests.title: Voices of the Desert
quests.description: Grace O'Malley is suggesting I approach a bard named Rima Bahar about joining the Silver Crows.

quests.title: Rise of the Beast
quests.description: I met a historian by the name of Phaedra Kanelos, who fancies herself something of a poet. She is looking to write the next great epic like her hero Homer, and is hoping that by defeating the Devourer, I will become a hero not unlike those in her favorite stories.

quests.title: Rise of the Hero
quests.description: Phaedra is still writing her epic, and wants to collect more notes to really make her story stand out. She has asked that I once again confront a Devourer and bring her the tales of my fight with it.

quests.title: A Cold Welcome
quests.description: Skye is reporting news of unusual Varangian activity in Great Cleave. Go to investigate and put a stop to their plans.

quests.title: Daichi Saito
quests.description: Grace O'Malley wants to add more firepower to the team. Find Daichi Saito and recruit him to the Silver Crows.

quests.title: The Ice Castle
quests.description: Work with Daichi Saito to find a way into the legendary Ice Castle, and look for the Frost Crown.

quests.title: The Mage
quests.description: Morgaine spoke of a mage who obtained the Staff of Samhain, the final artifact needed to empower Mordred and bring on an endless winter. Get the staff from the mage before Mordred does.

quests.title: The Winter Rune
quests.description: Get the Winter Rune that binds the three winter artifacts together, before Mordred gets to it.

quests.title: Eternal Frost
quests.description: Mordred has everything he needs to activate the Ancient device and become a winter demigod. Stop him before he brings about an Ice Age to Aeternum, and the rest of the world.

quests.title: From Client to Crow
quests.description: Mordred has been stopped, and another crisis averted, for now. Share the news with his mother, Morgaine.

quests.title: The Glacial Tarn (Expedition)
quests.description: Shailyn has found another way into the underground caverns in Great Cleave. She wants you to pursue Ser Loth and destroy him.

quests.title: The Ice of Life (Expedition)
quests.description: The healer Ao Wei, is interested in the potential for curative powers of ice found in the Glacial Tarn in Great Cleave. He wants you to collect samples of any interesting ice formations that you find deep in the caverns.

quests.title: Hope and Service
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Florina has requested you aid Feldan save what you can at Olcott Farm and then meet her at the Church in Everfall.

quests.title: The Covenant Enclave
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Florina has asked you to visit her brother Lethold at the Covenant enclave in south-eastern Everfall. She has attuned your spirit with the shrine, so you may travel there safely.

quests.title: Justice and Courage
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Lethold beseeches you to rush to Clearview Crypt to end whatever terrible acts are transpiring, save Templar Damiano, and return to him at the Covenant Enclave.

quests.title: The Lumen's Words
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Adjudicator Lethold has asked you to speak with Lumen Morellus at the Covenant Enclave for your final initiation test.

quests.title: Inspiration and Redemption
quests.description: Covenant Initiation Quest: Morellus has enlisted you to lure the Corrupted Templar back to Nettlerest Graveyard, best him in battle, collect his cursed necklace, and return to the Convenant Enclave.

quests.title: Committing to the Cause
quests.description: Covenant Recruitment: You can now join the Covenant.

quests.title: A First Step of Many
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Lieutenant Tibbs wants you to collect Lost Ears and a Knight's Signet ring at Lugdunum Fields for some sort of magic and then meet him at the ruin steps to the North of the farm.

quests.title: Fortune Favors
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Lieutenant Tibbs has directed you to thrash some pirates and steal some black powder barrels at the Pirate Stockpile and then return to the Marauders Enclave.

quests.title: Threshold Guardian
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Lieutenant Tibbs has asked you to speak with Gladiator Strou'dahia at the Marauder Enclave for your final initiation test.

quests.title: Broken Bones and Blasted Bulwarks
quests.description: Marauder Initiation Quest: Gladiator Stroudahia has ordered you to best Varangians and rescue captives at Stonereach Keep. You must also complete Tibb's secret mission, before returning to the Marauders' Enclave

quests.title: One of Us
quests.description: Marauders Recruitment Quest: You can now join the Marauders.

quests.title: Fickle Fusions, Fanged Folly
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Aventus has hired you to lure the altered wolves to Midnight Den and destroy them, then meet him at the Syndicate Enclave to the north-east when you are finished.

quests.title: Over the Cliffs, and Through the Woods
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Aventus has tasked you to climb the cliffs nearby into Brightwood and east into the grove of the Azoth Tree to collect water from the moat, and then return to him.

quests.title: Woes of the Wise
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Aventus has asked you to speak with Cabalist Cleo Elsayad at the Syndicate Enclave for your final initiation test.

quests.title: Burden of Responsibility
quests.description: Syndicate Initiation Quest: Cleo has requested that you travel to Broken Hull Hold, pour the sleeping draught into their wells, disrupt their reserves, and return to her at the Syndicate Enclave.

quests.title: True Knowledge
quests.description: Syndicate Recruitment Quest: You can now join the Syndicate.

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Gladiator
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Gladiator and then complete the Trial of the Gladiator quest from the Enclave.

quests.title: Marauder: Trial of the Gladiator
quests.description: Defeat the Lost and their leader, Pirate Lawrence of the Long Shadow to prove you're worthy to advance to the rank of Gladiator. Talk to Commander Silas at the Marauder Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Ravager
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Ravager and then complete the Trial of the Ravager Quest from the Faction Representative in Weaver's Fen.

quests.title: Marauder: Trial of the Ravager
quests.description: Defeat a clan of bears in Greyvale Grotto to advance to the rank of Ravager. Talk to Commander Silas at the Marauder Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Destroyer
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Destroyer and then complete the Trial of the Destroyer quest from the Faction Representative at the Enclave.

quests.title: Marauder: Trial of the Destroyer
quests.description: Defeat the corrupted ex-marauders in the Great Cleave. Talk to Lieutenant Tibbs at the Marauder Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Commander
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Commander and then complete the Trial of the Commander quest from the Faction Representative at the Enclave.

quests.title: Marauder: Trial of the Commander
quests.description: Defeat Corrupted Commander Silas and return the corrupted amulet to prove you're worthy to advance to the rank of Commander. Talk to Gladiator Strou'Dahia at the Marauder Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Marauder Advancement: Champion
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Champion and then complete the Trial of the Champion Quest from the Faction Representative at the Enclave.

quests.title: Marauder: Trial of the Champion
quests.description: Brave the dangers of Brimstone Sands and Hornhold to prove you're worthy to advance to the rank of Champion. Talk to Gladiator Strou'dahia at the Marauder Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Syndicate Advancement: Scrivener
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Scrivener and then complete the Trial of the Scrivener Quest from the Enclave.

quests.title: Syndicate: Trial of the Scrivener
quests.description: Defeat Lost Gheist Malikor and use the Psychokinetic Absorber to capture any ectoplasm to earn the rank of Scrivener. Talk to Alchemist Krockes at the Syndicate Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Syndicate Advancement: Chronicler
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Chronicler and then complete the Trial of the Chronicler quest from Alchemist Krockes at the Enclave.

quests.title: Syndicate: Trial of the Chronicler
quests.description: Gather ectoplasm and soul traces from the various Lost in Periville and return to Alchemist Krockes at the Syndicate Enclave to earn the rank of Chronicler.

quests.title: Syndicate Advancement: Cabalist
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Cabalist and then complete the Trial of the Cabalist quest from Alchemist Krockes at the Enclave.

quests.title: Syndicate: Trial of the Cabalist
quests.description: Place Psychokinetic Absorbers at strategic points in Mourningdale to earn the rank of Cabalist. Talk to Alchemist Krockes at the Syndicate Enclave when the task is done.

quests.title: Syndicate Advancement: Alchemist
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Alchemist and then complete the Trial of the Alchemist quest from Cleo Elsayad at the Enclave.

quests.title: Syndicate: Trial of the Alchemist
quests.description: Defeat Alchemist Krockes and absorb his soul into the Psychokinetic Absorber and then return it to Cleo Elsayad to earn the rank of Alchemist. Talk to Cleo Elsayad at the  Syndicate Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Syndicate Advancement: Magus
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Magus and then complete the Trial of the Magus quest from Cleo Elsayad at the Enclave.

quests.title: Syndicate: Trial of the Magus
quests.description: Venture to Tempestas Custodia to obtain the work of Syndicate Researcher Sigurdsson and return it to Cleo Elsayad to earn the rank of Magus. Talk to Cleo Elsayad at the Syndicate Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Covenant Advancement: Templar
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Templar and then complete the Trial of the Templar quest from Beatris Roose at the Covenant Enclave.

quests.title: Covenant: Trial of the Templar
quests.description: Track down the Apostate Covenant Initiate Bremen Luca and attempt to discover what happened to him to advance to the rank of Templar. Talk to Templar Roose at the Covenant Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Covenant Advancement: Excubitor
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Excubitor and then complete the Trial of the Excubitor quest from Livia Luca at the Covenant Enclave.

quests.title: Covenant: Trial of the Excubitor
quests.description: Find the second page of the journal of Bremen Luca to advance to the rank of Excubitor. Talk to Livia Luca at the Covenant Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Covenant Advancement: Lumen
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Lumen and then complete the Trial of the Lumen quest from Livia Luca at the Covenant Enclave.

quests.title: Covenant: Trial of the Lumen
quests.description: Find Bremen Luca's journal at Hollowing Fort and recover Prayer Beads from Corrupted Templars to earn the rank of Lumen. Talk to Adjudicator Luca at the Covenant Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Covenant Advancement: Adjudicator
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Adjudicator and then complete the Trial of the Adjudicator quest from the Lethold at the Covenant Enclave.

quests.title: Covenant: Trial of the Adjudicator
quests.description: Lay Corrupted Adjudicator Luca to rest and find Adjudicator Roose to earn the rank of Adjudicator. Talk to Lethold at the Covenant Enclave when the task is complete.

quests.title: Covenant Advancement: Paladin
quests.description: Earn enough Faction Reputation to qualify for the rank of Paladin and then complete the Trial of the Paladin quest from the Lethold at the Covenant Enclave.

quests.title: Covenant: Trial of the Paladin
quests.description: Find and defeat the Covenant Traitor in the Elysian Wilds to earn the rank of Paladin. Talk to Lethold at the Covenant Enclave when the task is complete.
